string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Gas_Bottle_004
string.body: Dry Crater;A crater treated with chemicals to enable the sampling of sulphur.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149A
string.body: Sulphur Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. It gushes out warm water high in sulphur content.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149B
string.body: Pool Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. There is a pool around it which teems with life.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149C
string.body: Rock Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. Hot water gushes out from the gap between the rocks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDElim_Cocoon
string.body: Writhing Cocoon;A cocoon made by insects inside Taloc to capture intruders. The Reian tribesmen Abyla and Engeius are trapped in these cocoons.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Ore_cart
string.body: Aether Cart;A cart found inside Haramel. It is used to transport the produced Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Rough_Odum
string.body: Raw Odium;Pure raw Odum found in the Odium Strip Mine of Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Burning_Odella
string.body: Processed Odella;Processed Odella found inside Haramel. It seems to be contaminated with a special chemical.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_DriedSam
string.body: Well-Dried Ginseng;Dried ginseng found in Haramel. You can prepare delicious ginseng soup with five of these.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Jar
string.body: Huge Cauldron;A huge cauldron found in Haramel. You can prepare some delicious ginseng soup here by adding five dried ginseng.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube
string.body: Severely Rusted Box;A box found at the top of the Haramel Tower, which is reached by using [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever]. It is said to contain valuable treasures of Hamerun.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance
string.body: Haramel Secret Entrance;A secret entrance in the Cantas Coast that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance_Da
string.body: Haramel Secret Passage;A secret passage in a Secret Mau Cave that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Supply_Box
string.body: Lionel's Medicine Box;A box of medicines made by Lionel.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF1a_SensoryArea_Q18500
string.body: Suspicious Relic Site;A relic site located on the Cantas Coast in Verteron. It looks to be the source of the suspicious Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF1a_SensoryArea_Q28500
string.body: Abandoned Relic Site;A relic site located in Impetusium. It looks to be the source of the discarded Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21072
string.body: Trace of Svasuth;It indicates that the bard Svasuth had been to the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_shugobody_Q21136
string.body: Berokin;A Shulack inventor who used to live in Nunglark Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21248
string.body: Balaur Limbcleaver;A weapon made by Drakan researchers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21249
string.body: Naduka Biolab Entrance;The entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_1
string.body: Limping Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_2
string.body: Concussed Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_3
string.body: Backache Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever
string.body: Tower Lift;A device that takes you to a higher level within the Haramel Tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Li
string.body: Aratus;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Da
string.body: Gwal;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Laum
string.body: Laum;An armour craftsman who wanders around Elysea. He is very skilled but doesn't like to show off. Recently, he's been rumoured to be staying in the Teminon Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Darkhum
string.body: Darkhum;An armour craftsman who wanders around in Asmodae. He is very skilled, but became bitter about everything when he failed to get any recognition. Recently he's been heard to be staying in the Primum Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_ShugoExhausted_Q30263
string.body: Fallen Shugo;A Shugo who went to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] searching for treasure, but failed to return safely and ended up imprisoned in The Storm Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_L8
string.body: Aurunerk;A greedy and devious Shugo in the Teminon Landing in Reshanta. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_D4
string.body: Ickulnerk;A Shugo in the Primum Landing in Reshanta, who is infamous for getting into all sorts of trouble due to his gullible nature. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Letia
string.body: Letia;A Daeva found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Silke
string.body: Silke;A Daeva found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Unos
string.body: Unos;A pet merchant found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. Pet eggs bought from Unos can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Katin
string.body: Katin;A pet merchant found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. Pet eggs bought from Katin can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076A
string.body: Illusion Fortress Windstream;A windstream found near the Inggison Illusion Fortress. It starts near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Jienia].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076B
string.body: Illusion & Phanoe Windstream;A windstream that extends from Illusion Fortress Windstream. It leads to the Phanoe Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076C
string.body: Phanoe & Taloc Windstream;A turbulent windstream that flows over the Phanoe Valley. It leads to Taloc's Hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Vafuth
string.body: Faruth;An Archon investigating wind paths on the ridge between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A6] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kotia
string.body: Kotia;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kahlen
string.body: Kahlen;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Regan
string.body: Regan;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Bethell
string.body: Bethell;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Will
string.body: Willow;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Festa
string.body: Festa;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47000
string.body: Ward Orb;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Altgard Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47003
string.body: Ward Globe;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Morheim Ice Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47006
string.body: Field Amplifier;A device that reinforces the Aetheric Field. It is found near the Morheim Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114a
string.body: Kaidan Altar;An altar found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K]. When a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Mentor] transform into Balaur at the altar, the Kaidan Head Priest appears.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114b
string.body: Krall Tribute Chest;The treasure that the Kaidan Krall pay to the Balaur. If [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] speaks to the Kaidan Head Priest, you can receive the Tribute Chest containing the small fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105a
string.body: Ice Claw Altar;An altar built by the Ice Claw tribe to offer tribute to the Balaur. An Ice Claw Head Priest will approach if Asmodian Daevas disguise themselves as Drakan here.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105b
string.body: Mau Tribute Chest;Tribute from the Ice Claw tribe to the Balaur. It is said to hold valuable Mau treasures.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000
string.body: Tainted Inina;A toxic Inina in the Ellun River in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37003
string.body: Hunting Blind[pl:"Blinds"];A yurt in the Manduri Forest, covered in leaves and disguising [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_LehparAs_43_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37006
string.body: Screened Hideout[pl:"Hideouts"];A leaf-covered yurt on the Lankusis Plateau that [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_DAssassin_43_An] live in.

string.name: STR_DIC_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21080A
string.body: Gelkmaros Fortress Windstream;A windstream that leads from the Gelkmaros Fortress to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2]. It starts in an area in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q20020
string.body: Abandoned Balaur Soldier Corpse[pl:"Corpses"];A Draconute corpse in the Antagor Battlefield. It was a casualty of the crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Minis
string.body: Minis;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Tali
string.body: Tali;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Sonaran
string.body: Sonaran;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Mayer
string.body: Mayer;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_LC1_XmasEvent_Santa
string.body: Portzebnerk;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] to organize Solorius. He is run off his feet with festival duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_LF4_3
string.body: Squeegenerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21], [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10], and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_DC1_XmasEvent_Rudolf
string.body: Rangidax;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] to organize Solorius. He looks a little tired from all his efforts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_Peddler_Df4_01
string.body: Zubinerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_26], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_19], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Lotus
string.body: Thourak;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Metrano
string.body: Metrano;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Harmonan
string.body: Tirrian;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Druike
string.body: Druike;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Namor
string.body: Namor;A Daeva in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] who is helping give out boxed lunches for the New Year Event.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Nepor
string.body: Nepor;A Daeva in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] who is helping give out boxed lunches for the New Year Event.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ionse
string.body: Ionse;An Administrative Retainer at the Anangke Excavation Camp in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yujinius
string.body: Yujinius;An Administrative Retainer to Changarunerk in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Schwaben
string.body: Schwaben;An Administrative Retainer at the Volcano Research Base in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atotas
string.body: Atotas;An Administrative Retainer at the dangerous Red Lava Cliff in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_Dr_CM
string.body: Watcher's Sphere[pl:"Spheres"];Can be found in the Aturam Sky Fortress hangar. He supervises the labourers and sounds the alarm as soon as intruders show up.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_BOMB
string.body: H Core;Sometimes unstable, this power generator grants life to Weapon H.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_S_BOX
string.body: Popuchin's Document Chest;A box in which Popuchin, a Shulack Supervisor in the Aturam Sky Fortress, keeps important papers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_Dr_BOOK
string.body: Balaur Data Crystal;A Balaur crystal for recording information. While Daevas use books and written documents, Balaur prefer crystals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_BOX
string.body: Seal Stamped Box;A box in the Aturam Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone. It bears a Balaur stamp meaning it contains Reian Tribe Relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_POWER
string.body: New Surkana;A state-of-the-art Surkana for crafting the latest model of Dredgion. Nastika is guarding it in the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_FOBJ_TOWER1
string.body: Dredgion Generator;A huge device for controlling Surkana in the Dredgion Command Area of Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDStation_ShulackAirplane
string.body: Steam Tachysphere;A small airship made by Popuchin. It posesses weapons powerful enough to defeat even Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Raues
string.body: Sierrac;A Reian Elder who waits near the Elementis Forest Entrance in Anaz Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brenon
string.body: Brenon;A Reian tribesman who heads the efforts to rescue Davlin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gortea
string.body: Davlin;Sorceress of the Reian tribe, researching golems in Argent Manor. She has been captured by Zadra Spellweaver.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yilios
string.body: Sulos;A Reian Sorcerer who suspects that Glowing Spirits may contain a power that could help the Reian people.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4a_01
string.body: Sesinerk;A Black Cloud Shugo who has ambitious ideas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LF4a_01
string.body: Morikin;A Shulack who dreams of establishing his own traders group.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lauron
string.body: Lauron;A Reian Elder.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lumen
string.body: Lumen;A Reian High Sorcerer in Kamar. He does not suffer fools gladly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_02
string.body: Vanilinerk;A Black Cloud Shugo whose father is a high-ranking member of the Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_01
string.body: Mewrinerk;A Black Cloud Shugo who is lovesick over his boss' daughter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4a_01
string.body: Yurkiki;A Shulack.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Antigone
string.body: Daidra;A member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_elleos
string.body: Rothyns;Protector of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_01_BionicCPU_53_Ah]. She used to live in the Dalia Garden, but now hides from the Balaur at the Esoterrace Entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_derna
string.body: Derna;A Wisplight Legionary dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leah
string.body: Tillen;A Sanctum Expeditionary Force centurion stationed at the Inggison Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nepion
string.body: Nepion;A friendly Reian spy. He is a member of the Reian tribe and was called to defend against the encroaching threat posed by the Balaur. You can find him in the Esoterrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_hedele
string.body: Hendele;An Archon investigating the disappearance of Balaur Prisoners at Vorgaltem.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_ovirin
string.body: Ovirin;An Archon investigating dissapearing Balaur Prisoners at the Crimson Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Luigir
string.body: Luigir;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force Archon dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3_Castle].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_loqui
string.body: Loqui;An Fatebound Archon dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3_Castle].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dmytro
string.body: Relyt;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force centurion at the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_idioma
string.body: Lanuaga;A Guardian investigating the disappearance of Balaur Prisoners at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_odde
string.body: Koray;A Guardian investigating the disappearance of Balaur Prisoners at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arora
string.body: Noratha;A Teleporter. She sends Daevas from Inggison Illusion Fortress to Kaisinel Academy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mazion
string.body: Mazion;He recruits for Kaisinel Academy in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Molfus
string.body: Molfus;A Combat Sergeant of the Kaisinel Academy. He is in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby], training ordinary Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Virvain
string.body: Virvain;A Teleporter. He sends Daevas from Gelkmaros Fortress to the Marchutan Priory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anja
string.body: Anja;A Combat Sergeant with the Marchutan Priory. She trains ordinary Daevas in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tymora
string.body: Tymora;She recuits for the Marchutan Priory in Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Amis
string.body: Amis;A pet summoner found to the east of Elyos Square in Sanctum. Bring her a pet egg or a summoning lamp and she will help you.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Erdil
string.body: Erdil;A pet summoner at Pandaemonium Plaza. Bring her a pet egg or a summoning lamp and she will help you.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enoa
string.body: Enoa;A Centurion dispatched to Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gelion
string.body: Gelion;A Reian Elder strategist who worries greatly about the end of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lagia
string.body: Lagia;An Elyos Sentinel who is eager to get into battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kenros
string.body: Kenros;A Reian Elder.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ein
string.body: Ein;A Reian alchemist in Satrakand.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Shulack_LF4a_8
string.body: Larukin;A Shulack Refugee located in the vicinity of Satrakand. He collects Balaur scales for reasons unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Bharakha
string.body: Maduka's Spirit;Formerly a Drakan retainer of Raksha, Maduka betrayed his lord. Unable to escape Raksang before the Seal was set, he was changed into a Mau and killed by Raksha loyalists. His ghost haunts Raksang in a rage.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Dracan_s
string.body: Nasuram;A Raksha Legionary who joined Maduka's treasonous plot. He was trapped by Raksha's Seal and wanders Raksang as a ghost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Horian
string.body: Umrian;He was the first Reian to enter Raksang through Arza's Corridor, but there has been no news since he left. He awaits you between Terror's Vault and Torment's Forge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zaellen
string.body: Zaellen;An Archon Guardian in Satrakand.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maios
string.body: Maios;A Reian Elder commanding the recapture of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Oreitia
string.body: Oreitia;She narrowly escaped Rentus Base before it was taken by the Balaur. She has suspicions about the Balaur attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ariana
string.body: Ariana;A top lieutentant at Rentus Base, who remains inside the base. She may have been captured by the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rodelion
string.body: Rodelion;A Reian Soldier who is trapped in Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lition
string.body: Lition;A Reian Soldier who escaped the Balaur takeover of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Paios
string.body: Paios;A Reian Soldier who is trapped in Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vicios
string.body: Paudav;Killed in the Balaur takeover of Rentus Base, he appears when you light the incense burner in the Sparring Grounds. He lived a dramatic life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Autiron
string.body: Autiron;He has been consumed by anxiety since his fiancee Enetia disappeared in the Balaur takeover of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ena
string.body: Ena;A Deathchant Centurion whose ambitions outpace his ability.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Haminon
string.body: Haminon;A Deathchant Legionary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Wurus
string.body: Wurus;A Reian Soldier who worries about his sister, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Danell].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Danell
string.body: Danell;She is obsessed with dark visions of misery and suffering. Her brother, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Wurus], thinks she just needs a pet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Talin
string.body: Cradyn;A particularly bloodthirsty Fatebound Legionary.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vasa
string.body: Vasa;A Darkseeker Centurion who is a cautious strategist.

string.body: Craig;A mysterious Daeva hanging around at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_28]. He has some connection to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Heloise].

string.body: Emeele;A mysterious Daeva hanging around at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10]. She has some connection to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Tristan].

string.body: Heloise;A mysterious Daeva hanging around at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_19]. She has some connection to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Abelard].

string.body: Witchta;Untrusting, she watches the throngs in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Sunshine
string.body: Sunshine;Playful, she's been known to break into songs and rhyme without provocation. She walks between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Blingbling
string.body: Glimma;Storyteller, organizer, fighter of foes--Glimma is the right Daeva to run Crab Fest from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1]. If you're lucky, she'll tell you Aion's Crab Tale.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Inggril
string.body: Inggril;A Daeva of Time in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby]. She manages the Illusion Stadium for the Kaisinel Academy.

string.body: Inggness;A Daeva of Time in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby]. She manages the Illusion Stadium for the Marchutan Priory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hiel
string.body: Hiel;A Reian scholar who is highly skilled at making sealing devices using Aether and Drana energy. There has been no word from him since he left for Raksang.

string.body: Mijien;An assistant to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_3111_Boss_Da_1]. She protects the Agent in secret, so is rarely seen except when Gelkmaros is successfully defended.

string.body: Yushin;An assistant to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_2111_Boss_Li_1]. She protects the Agent in secret, so is rarely seen except when Inggison is successfully defended.

string.body: Undin;A Construction Master in the Artisans Hall in Sanctum. He is a slave driver who is extremely tough to please.

string.body: Lurine;One of Udin's apprentices, who sells cabinetmaking items in the Artisans Hall in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rayot

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Event_Rift_Potal
string.body: Warped Rift;An strange Rift whose formation and origins are a mystery. Many Daevas have been lost in them, so take care!

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_Liltese
string.body: Liltese;A young Daeva who emerged from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Event_Rift_Potal]. She is asking aroudn all the fortresses in Elysea to find her missing father.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_Amynees
string.body: Amyna;A young Daeva who emerged from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Event_Rift_Potal]. She is asking around all the fortresses in Asmodae to find her missing father.

string.body: Hinjel;An old refugee who has lost her family and now wanders about complaining of the cold.

string.body: Adella;Reian Tiamaranta Expedition Governor who has a deep admiration for Kahrun.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Udvi

string.body: Riome;A Jotun Researcher in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_09]. His position as assistant to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Acheron] is made more difficult by his boss' poor hearing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laso
string.body: Laso;He runs the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17] in Kamar. He is a good-natured man, though some accuse him of watering down his drinks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_leyni
string.body: Leyni;A Bartender at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. She mixes a cocktail with Raydam herb that is rumoured to be Kahrun's favourite drink.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_yohar
string.body: Yohar;A souse usually found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. Depending on who you ask, he was once a pirate, a Pagati racer, or Sarpan's boldest spelunker.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_miyerin
string.body: Miyerin;A waitress at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. She is tired of cleaning up after [%dic:STR_DIC_N_yohar].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Miss_drakan
string.body: The Dell Witch;Nobody is sure why this Drakan lingers in a cave in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A2]. Those in Drakan form can use the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S4] to find her residence.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4B_FOBJ_T3_Wagon
string.body: Abandoned Wagon;An abandoned, decrepit cart near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_CrystalBox
string.body: Antique Chest;Chests of old artefacts that can be uncovered around the Siel's Temple Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_CrystalYun
string.body: Frozen Reian Tribe;The spirits of ancient Reians, sealed inside crystalline outcroppings around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2]. The crystals can be weakened with an Aether Marble.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41575A
string.body: Weathered Mamut Bones;The bones of a long-dead Mamut inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S4]. Legend says that they're haunted. Use a Projection Crystal to find out.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_OldCube
string.body: Ancient Cube;The cube belonging to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo6], which went missing in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brownie_Caldron
string.body: Kobold Cauldron;A large, simmering cauldron in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA07]. It gives off a foul chemical odor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41580A
string.body: Orph's Body;It lies where Orph fell in the Avad Mine. You can send the body back into the Aether using a Combustion Crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41593A
string.body: Aether Shield Generator;An important defensive tool for the Siege Troop Garrison. Use the most powerful Aether Crystal possible to maximise its effectiveness.

string.body: Luespaner;Captain of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Sadonix] and Admiral of the fleet. Allegedly, he has been flying for longer than anyone else in the fleet any other captain.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_Giantwar
string.body: Petralith Fragment;A fragment of an ancient Petralith. Because it has taken on sacred meaning for Sarpan Calydon, it probably can be found in a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_21509all].

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_Q21517a
string.body: Missing Door;From a refugee wagon, it's covered in large hoofprints. There are few hooved creatures that big in Sarpan, except the Calydon.

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_soil_Q41164
string.body: Mouldering Leaves;A mound of leaves in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] that seems somehow... different. It gives off a healthy, invigorating aroma.

string.name: STR_DIC_FOBJ_halfcorpse
string.body: Dead Hornskull;They are often found in the eastern oasis of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1], where many Hornskull go to die. It is said that these bodies contain beneficial compounds.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q41301_baby

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11518A
string.body: Stiff Strigik Feather;These Strigik tailfeathers make excellent feather pens. You might find one in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3].

string.body: Missing Door;Evidence that the Calydon are up to something.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41203A
string.body: Petrahulk Specimen;A piece of broken-down Petrahulk. These pieces are scattered around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41211A
string.body: Explorer's Backpack;The owner of this bag went missing in the sands below the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_10].

string.body: Sanctuary Debris;Fragments of the temple floating above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09]. Scholars are eager to pry secrets from them.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_Firewood_Q41172

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_Crack_Q41257
string.body: Malignant Fissure;These fissures continue to split the earth in the area around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000].

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_Firewood_Q41267

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q11519
string.body: Urugugu Village Idol;A great totem which stands in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It seems important to the tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_Decoy_Q41162
string.body: Smooth Boulder;A boulder in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] that must contain trace elements important for Redscale Hornskulls, because it has been worn down by their teeth.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q10051

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q10052
string.body: Stone Coffer;A stone chest carved by unknown hands. It's sturdy, well-hidden, and provides excellent protection for whatever's within.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q41163
string.body: Covered Wagon;This wagon and trusty Brax are all that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Riletia] have left.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q41258a
string.body: Guardian Monolith Base;Base where a Guardian Monolith once stood before it was destroyed by the Drakan. It's located where you can see the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_01] in the Destroyed Guardian's Seal.

string.body: Loyolung;A High Alchemist with special abilities, currently in Pernon. By using the Alchemy of the Spirit, which is taboo among alchemists, he created the Great Spirit of Fire. The Spirit, however, is losing HP.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_World_dinner_of_Devas_Day_L
string.body: Daevas' Birthday Banquet;Located in every stronghold in Atreia. If you obtain the ingredients from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Soui] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Cleid] and use these with the Birthday Banquet, it may grant you an Enhancement Spell, which would also affect other Daevas in the vicinity.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2a_Portal_Box_Q49004
string.body: Chest containing Confidential Documents;A chest containing confidential documents, stolen by Jamanok in Asmodae. It is hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_C_Town].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Entrance_L_Adma
string.body: Great Rift in the Abyss;A rift in the Abyss, which has suddenly appeared in the Observatory Village. It is a passage leading to the Adma Stronghold in Asmodae.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Entrance_D_Teo
string.body: Distorted Rift in the Abyss;A rift in the Abyss, which has suddenly appeared in the Baltasar Hill Village. It is a passage leading to the secret Theobomos Lab in Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_parqusha
string.body: Parqusha;An Asmodian Researcher who was sent to investigate the Rift in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rovilance
string.body: Rovilance;A new bounty hunter, investigating the Rift in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Barlack
string.body: Barlack;A Teleporter from the Red Hasia Legion in Reshanta. You can teleport from Morheim to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ] with Barlack's help.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Rogun
string.body: Rogun;A Teleporter from the Grey Wind Legion in Reshanta. You can teleport from Eltnen to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ] with Rogun's help.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Kelmar
string.body: Kelmar;An Instructor from the Red Hasia Legion in Reshanta. He was dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] to find a Daeva who would take on the task of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2_Brando
string.body: Brando;An Instructor from the Grey Wind Legion in Reshanta. He was dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] to find a Daeva who would take on the task of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle_SZ_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Cebath
string.body: Sebas;Supervisor of the Inn Workers at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_lf_personal_agora].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Aias
string.body: Aias;Inn Worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_lf_personal_agora].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Alfredo
string.body: Alfredo;Supervisor of the Inn Workers at[%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_df_personal_agora].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Hanes
string.body: Hanes;Inn Worker at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Housing_df_personal_agora].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC
string.body: Indiana Jonshunerk;A suspicious Shugo who is assembling Daevas at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] opposite of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Flora] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] gateway in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC_Da
string.body: Alberto Einshudison;A suspicious Daeva who is assembling other Daevas at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] gateway in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung
string.body: Octorung;A Shugo gathering [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80284A] in Sanctum and Pandaemonium to make beer.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Reklov
string.body: Reklov;A master brewer who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_REKLOV] in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. When the beer is brewed, you can buy valuable items using the ticket, such as a rare beer that can recover Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Nitram
string.body: Nitram;A master brewer who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_NITRAM] in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. When the beer is brewed, you can buy valuable items using the ticket, such as a rare beer that can recover Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Eimaj
string.body: Eimaj;A master brewer who exchanges [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT] for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_EIMAJ] in Sanctum or Pandaemonium. When the beer is brewed, you can buy valuable items using the ticket, such as a rare beer that can recover Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Berou
string.body: Vero;A Reian in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021]. He managed to escape the Beritra Research Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Gadoron
string.body: Gadoron;An Elyos scientist who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tenisian
string.body: Tenisian;A Guardian Centurion stationed in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kaimir
string.body: Kaimeer;An Archon Centurion stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sertes
string.body: Sertes;An Asmodian scientist who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6021].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Kahrun_1
string.body: Kahrun;The respected leader of the Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Ariana
string.body: Ariana;Former staff officer at the Rentus Base, but took part in the Tiamat Fortress attack operation following the death of Vasharti. Encountered either by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Sorus
string.body: Sorus;Former captain of the reinforcement unit sent to recapture the Rentus Base. He is now taking part in the Tiamat Fortress attack operation. He can be found either by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2] or by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Garnon_1_T
string.body: Tiamat Garnon;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bhasha
string.body: Behasha the Ill-Boding;A great Prophet of the Balaur. Was imprisoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1] as he predicted Tiamat's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Surama_1
string.body: Apprehended Drakan Researcher;Captured subjects of Surama. They can be found everywhere in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Murugan_1
string.body: Faithful Murugan;A faithful subject of Surama. Mourning Surama's death at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Surama_1
string.body: Surama the Traitor;Former head of the Esoterrace Secret Laboratory, but now imprisoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1] because he designed the plan to murder Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Rw
string.body: Vershaka;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Weapon_Rw
string.body: Kirshaka;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Armor_Rw
string.body: Jurshaka;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat
string.body: Tiamat;The fifth Dragon Lord and Ruler over Blood and Wrath. You will find her in her shelter or above the Gateway to the Bloody Throne.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1
string.body: Kaisinel;The Empyrean Lord of Illusion. One of the five Empyrean Lords ruling over Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1
string.body: Marchutan;The Empyrean Lord of Fate. One of the five Empyrean Lords ruling over Asmodae.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Israphel_1_D
string.body: Israphel;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6
string.body: Statue of Glory;Statue standing in the middle of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1]. It is also a hidden facility that can be used to access the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Model
string.body: Terath Dredgion Model;Available to view in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_DranaReactor
string.body: Drana Accelerator;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_GravityController
string.body: Gravity Control Machine;IDTiamat

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Scroll
string.body: Tahabata Legion Orders;Lying on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5_1]. They contain the incantation plan from Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Dagger
string.body: Rancour-filled Dagger;A Dagger found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. It contains terrible rancour.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Li_Statue
string.body: Elyos Hero Statue;On view in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. One of Dragon Lord Tiamat's evil customs is to wear the souls of enemies as jewellery.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Da_Statue
string.body: Asmodian Hero Statue;On view in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. One of Dragon Lord Tiamat's evil customs is to wear the souls of enemies as jewellery.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pino
string.body: Pino;An air transporter working in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Litzof
string.body: Lissop;An air transporter working in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ellano
string.body: Ellano;A centurion who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Sanctum. He is fully trusted by all other Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Benad
string.body: Bernard;An Abyss combat master who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Sanctum. He harbours a deep-seated grudge against the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Morad
string.body: Morad;An Abyss combat master who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Sanctum. He is known to be a combat expert of the abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ceana
string.body: Seyana;An Elysean combat master who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Sanctum. She is heading up the fight against the Asmodians invaders into Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Famien
string.body: Fameen;The person in charge of rewards, who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Sanctum. She rewards Daevas who have completed Legion tasks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bcerleno
string.body: Buseruno;A centurion who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Pandaemonium. He feels that he is responsible for the welfare of the legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sarban
string.body: Sarban;A Balaur who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Pandaemonium. He is known for his plans of fighting the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anonte
string.body: Anonte;An Abyss combat master who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Pandaemonium. She is very wary of the ruthless battles in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kellin
string.body: Keln;An Asmodae combat master who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Pandaemonium. She has already been there for a very long time and has grown tired of her task.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Venoti
string.body: Benoti;The person in charge of rewards, who was dispatched to the Legions Board in Pandaemonium. She is a Daeva that has previously worked as a person in charge of rewards elsewhere.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q30710_hero
string.body: Gabelinne;She may have been turned into an [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Li_Statue] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Q30760_hero
string.body: Hakellan;He may have been turned into an [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Da_Statue] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Kahrun_6
string.body: Kahrun;He journeyed to the past during negotiations with Tiamat and regained the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6] upon Tiamat's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Drakan_Armor
string.body: Statue of the Hero Vershaka;Will turn into a Drakan with the Soul ouf the Drakan if it is touched.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_Drakan_Medal_Rw
string.body: Faithful Narkun;Surama's faithful subject who is working in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6] in order to fool Tiamat's troops and steal their goods.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_1_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Gateway to Tiamat's Fortress;A direct gateway to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. It is located in the northern area of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_2_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Tiamat's Shelter entrance;Direct way to get to[%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1]. It is located in the centre of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Solon
string.body: Solon;A Guardian stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in northern Katalam. He will appear if the Sillus Fortress has been occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Ulra
string.body: Ulra;An Archon stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in northern Katalam. He will appear if the Sillus Fortress is occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5b_attika_G_LHF
string.body: Atica;A Guardian at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] in southern Katalam. She is investigating the Void Room and will appear if the Bassen Fortress has been occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5b_resco_G_LHF
string.body: Lesco;An administrator at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] in southern Katalam. He appears if the Bassen Fortress has been occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Marke_E
string.body: Marga;A Medic of the Katalam Patrol. She is taking care of injured Guardians at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Tiryns_Commander
string.body: Tirins;Governor of the Katalam Patrol. He is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L], and is working towards the Elyos' conquest of Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Rimo_E
string.body: Rimo;A Medic of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. She is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D], taking care of Archons that were injured in an Elyos surprise attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Bard_Commander
string.body: Bard;Governor of the Katalam Cleanup Squad He is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D], and is working towards the Asmodians' conquest of Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Oberus
string.body: Oberus;A Reian who escaped the Beritra Research Laboratory.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5b_Niber_G_DHM
string.body: Niver;An Archon who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] in southern Katalam. He is investigating the Void Room and will appear if the Bassen Fortress has been occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5b_Vesmo_G_DHM
string.body: Vesmo;An Administrator at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SV_6011] in southern Katalam. He will appear if Bassen Fortress has been occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Diel_E
string.body: Diel;A Centurion of the Katalam Patrol. He is assisting Governor Tirins at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] with the conquest of the territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Bilveo_E
string.body: Bilbeo;A Centurion of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He is assisting Governor Bard at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] with the conquest of the territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Ilium_E
string.body: Illium;A Reian who is responsible for the Statue of Binding in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Apolis_E
string.body: Aporis;A Reian who is responsible for the Statue of Binding in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Gurd_E
string.body: Gurd;Envoy of the Reian Tribe's elders in Katalam. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Nani_E
string.body: Nania;The last person to see Kahrun, and now actively searching for him. Nania can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Roras_E
string.body: Loras;A Centurion of the Katalam Patrol. She can be found at the patrol's scout post by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Latte_E
string.body: Lahte;A Centurion of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He can be found at the Cleanup Squad's scout post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.body: Captain of the Occupied Territory Porius;The Captain who is in charge of the Occupied Territory. He keeps the Asmodians in check and defends the Occupied Territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Ellino_E_LHM
string.body: Elino;A Wanderer staying in Poeta for a short time. He was once known as the administrator of the novice server, but is currently leading a wandering lifestyle for unknown reasons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Marelin_E_LHW
string.body: Madelin;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Combine_Rookie] administrator. You will meet her on the novice server, which you can switch to using the 'Channel' menu item.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1_Riam_E_DHM
string.body: Liam;A Wanderer staying in Ishalgen for a short time. He is known as the administrator of the novice server. He is currently leading a wandering lifestyle for unknown reasons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1_Noelen_DHM
string.body: Noelen;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Combine_Rookie] administrator. You will meet him on the novice server, which you can switch to using the 'Channel' menu item.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Alcmenes_G
string.body: Alcmenes;A Tribunus of the Elyos Beluslan Underground Squad who captured the post of the Hoarfrost Mau. He is defending the post.

string.body: Demonax;Tribunus of the Elyos Heiron Protectors, who is tasked with preventing the Lepharist Revolutionaries and the Asmodians from conquering the post. He is defending the post.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5Re_Solo_Q_IdgelMachine
string.body: Modified Aether Cannon[pl:"Cannons"] of the Rune Tribe;Cube-shaped Aether cannon of the Rune Tribe. When activated, it forms a protective shield in the vicinity and fires at approaching enemies. The Beritra Army excavated it in the Katalam Underground.

string.body: Damaged Hyperion;A weapon of the Rune Tribe from ancient times, which can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. It is damaged.

string.body: Laius;Laius has left Pandarung again. He is now at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Cassander_M
string.body: Cassander;An Instructor of engineers in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He comes from a family of engineers, and showed outstanding talent as a mechanic even when he was a child.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1_Cynisca_M
string.body: Cynisca;An Instructor of artists in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02] in Poeta. He's a cheery artist whose talent is widely recognised and who works to instructs the next generation.
