string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Ambros_E
string.body: Ambros;A member of the Reian Search Party. He is looking for Kahrun near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Trace1L_E
string.body: Jakahn;An Elysean Daeva searching for Kahrun by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B6]. However, he does somehow seem suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Torio_E
string.body: Torio;Part of the Kahrun Escort. He is badly injured and can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_DieYunL_E
string.body: Jemini;He is part of the Kahrun Escort, and is not sensible. He can be found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Gram_E
string.body: Gram;A Centurion of the Katalam Patrol. He can be found at the Patrol's Guard Post near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_DieVritraL_E
string.body: Mortal Remains of a Beritra Soldier;The mortal remains of a Beritra soldier whose exact affiliation is unknown. They can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Thrasir_E
string.body: Thrasir;A Centurion of the Katalam Patrol. He can be found at the Patrol's observation post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Trace2L_E
string.body: Jakahn;An Elysean Daeva searching for Kahrun. You met him again by chance at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Meib_E
string.body: Maiv;A Katalam Patrol Guardian. He can be found at the Patrol's Guard Post in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5_Village_Guard01_D
string.body: Abus;The Captain of the Asmodians' First Katalam Occupation Troop. He was dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A2_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Yarna_E
string.body: Yarma;A member of the Reian Search Party. He is looking for Kahrun near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Trace1D_E
string.body: Niel;An Asmodian Daeva looking for Kahrun by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6]. She somehow seems suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Tolkien_E
string.body: Tolkin;Part of the Kahrun Escort. He is badly injured and can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_DieYunD_E
string.body: Jeminu;He is part of the Kahrun Escort and is unconscious at the moment. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Teodreic_E
string.body: Theodrik;A Centurion of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He can be found at the Katalam Cleanup Squad's Guard Post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_DieVritraD_E
string.body: Body of a Beritra Soldier;Corpse of a Beritra soldier whose exact affiliation is unknown. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Otr_E
string.body: Otro;A Centurion of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He can be found at the Katalam Cleanup Squad's observation post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Trace2D_E
string.body: Niel;An Asmodian Daeva who is looking for Kahrun. You met her by chance at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Belrun_E
string.body: Ballan;A soldier at the Katalam Cleanup Squad's observation post. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Hide1_Q10083a
string.body: Conspicuous[pl:"Conspicuous"] Bush[pl:"Bushes"];An artificial bush that can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Hide2_Q10083b
string.body: Conspicuous Earth Mound[pl:"Mounds"];An artificial earth mound that can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Sword_Q10084
string.body: Broken[pl:"Broken"] Sword[pl:"Swords"];A broken sword that still bears visible marks of battle. It can be found at an old battleground near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5a_Sword_Q20084
string.body: Battle-Marked Broken[pl:"Broken"] Sword[pl:"Swords"];A broken sword that still bears visible marks of battle. It can be found at an old battleground near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Hamarung_F
string.body: Hamarunerk;A Black Cloud Merchant in the Heiron Fortress. He can take you to the Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Jabarung_F
string.body: Jabarunerk;A Black Cloud Merchant in the Heiron Fortress. This Shugo can take you to the Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Amerinrin_F
string.body: Amerinrinerk;Takes care of the apprentices of the Black Cloud Merchants in the Heiron Fortress. He will take you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_L_2F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Dayrinrin_F
string.body: Deirinrinerk;Takes care of the apprentices of the Black Cloud Merchants in the Heiron Fortress, and can take you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_D_2F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_WORLD_IDEVENT_TREASUREROOM
string.body: Sacred Altar;The Altar of the ancient Shugo Emperor. Place the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_A], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_B] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_C] on it to enter the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01_Room].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Cielo
string.body: Cielo;An inhabitant of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Fabiola
string.body: Fabiola;An Eltnen Protector stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Celta
string.body: Celta;An Eltnen Protector stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Alef
string.body: Alleph;An Abyss contribution record keeper who can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_2] and who supports heroes in their development.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Arabella
string.body: Arabella;An inhabitant of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Ziva
string.body: Ziba;A Morheim Protector who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Soraya
string.body: Soraya;A Morheim Protector who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Dalet
string.body: Dalet;Keeper of records of Abyss achievements, who can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_4] and who supports heroes in their development.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Huwooring_E
string.body: Hurinerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam, who was dispatched to investigate the Steel Rose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1F_E
string.body: Yukarunerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam. He knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_1F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2F_E
string.body: Kikorinerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam. She knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_2F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3F_E
string.body: Tocharunerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam. He knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_3F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Phobos_E
string.body: Phobos;A member of the Elyos Sanctum Expeditionary Knights, stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2_2]. He was originally a part of the Gold Feather Legion but opted for Portis' leadership instead as it was better for his career.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ovius_E
string.body: Obius;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2_2], who supports Kaberinerk by way of military subsidies. He used to work with Phobos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tes_E
string.body: Tes;A member of the expedition group in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A3], who used to be part of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He doesn't know the area in Katalam very well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Deimos_E
string.body: Deimos;Soldier of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He is collecting Idium on Pepe's orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Faitos_E
string.body: Paitos;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He wants to obtain information about Katalam from the 40th Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Hesius_E
string.body: Hesius;An Elyos Petralith Researcher.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Henis_E
string.body: Henis;An Elyos from the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C1]. He despises the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Gilius_E
string.body: Gilius;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C1]. He suspects the Dragonbound of hatching a treacherous plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Iafes_E
string.body: Iafes;Soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He wants to destroy the Beritra Army with the help of the Tiamat Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Arodos_E
string.body: Arodos;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1]. He is hard-working and supports Kuretes, even though he does not like him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kuretes_E
string.body: Kuretes;A researcher from the Elyos Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He is researching Id in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1], but has had no success so far.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Metamo_E
string.body: Metamo;A commander of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights who is stationed in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1]. He looks down on members of the Gold Feather Legion with contempt.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Toga_E
string.body: Toka;A liaison for the Elyos Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He doesn't seem to be clever enough to have such an important position.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Nesimo_E
string.body: Nesimo;A High Priest of the Elyos. In his view, the Id in Katalam needs to be eliminated.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Terea_E
string.body: Terea;A member of the Elyos Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He thinks the Dragonbound are a group of heretics who need to be destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Aphetos_E
string.body: Apetos;Soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He wants to do research on the ceremonies of the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Mnesine_E
string.body: Menesine;member of the Elyos Sanctum Expeditionary Knights, stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3]. He tends to let others do his tasks for him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_belius_E
string.body: Berius;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3]. He doesn't like Menesine and only grudgingly working with him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tragos_E
string.body: Tragos;Soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. A Daeva with a strong sense of justice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ateia_E
string.body: Ateia;A member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights, stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1]. He harbours a deep hatred towards the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Rebos_E
string.body: Rebos;A simple and untrained member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Farteno_E
string.body: Parteno;A soldier of the Gold Feather Legion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1]. He supports the Expeditionary Templars.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kailes_E
string.body: Kaires;A commander who used to be part of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tetis_E
string.body: Tetis;A soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, stationed at the Beritra defence line. He wants to work hard and fulfil his duties as best as possible, but is having trouble doing so at present.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Heres_E
string.body: Heres;A lazy, crafty soldier of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He finds it normal to say other people's work was his.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Demios_E
string.body: Demios;A Gold Feather Legion Tribunus. He wants Portis to like him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Paunus_E
string.body: Paunus;A centurion who used to be in the Gold Feather Legion. He's convinced that you have to give everything in battle against the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Mainad_E
string.body: Mainad;An Elyos from the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights, stationed at the Prades Plain. He wishes to save the petrified Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Mopolrio_E
string.body: Mopolio;A member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights who wants to help Waterinerk tap spring water. He can't take any criticism.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Shinisto_E
string.body: Sinisto;A member of the expedition group who used to be part of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He is currently investigating the Forgotten Swamp, as he finds the way in which the spring water is tapped to be suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Mele_E
string.body: Melle;A member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1]. He in charge of the Id Research Tool of the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Klonis_E
string.body: Klonis;One of Pepe's followers. He believes he can get hold of munitions through his friendship with the Shugos that work for Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kaberinrin_E
string.body: Kaberinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's subsudiary ramparts company. He's busy composing a report in order to obtain funding.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kliring_E
string.body: Klirinerk;A Shugo who works at Goldrinyerk Limited. He takes care of various things having to do with Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Survival_Drakan
string.body: Survivor[pl:"Survivors"] of the 55th Unit;A defeated soldier of the Tiamat Legion. He would do anything to take revenge on the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Berics_E
string.body: Beriks;He is carrying out Stelman's orders and observing Peniun in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Pin_E
string.body: Pin;A scout from the Red Fang Underground Troop in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Denitz_E
string.body: Tenitz;A member of the Red Fang expedition group in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Gali_E
string.body: Gali;He is in charge of investigating the Idgel Cube at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Shutart_E
string.body: Shutat;A Fatebound Legionary who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2_1]. He fears that the Beritra Army is growing more powerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ratia_E
string.body: Latia;A member of the Red Fang Underground Troop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dorf_E
string.body: Dorph;Fatebound Legion Centurion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2_1]. The huge workload is putting him under stress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Keltoy_E
string.body: Keltoi;A member of the Red Fang Underground Squad at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Berkin_E
string.body: Berkin;A scout for the Red Fang Underground Troop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4]. He keeps the Beritra Intelligence in check.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Roengram_E
string.body: Roengram;A Petralith researcher on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4]. He is researching the Nevilim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Peniun_E
string.body: Peniun;An Idgel researcher who carries out experiments in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1_1] using Id energy. These experiments often result in accidents.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sulis_E
string.body: Sulis;A Fatebound Legionary who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2]. He records and analyses the extraordinary events in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Toan_E
string.body: Tuan;A soldier of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1] to destroy the Beritra Troops.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ringermen_E
string.body: Lingaman;Fatebound Legionary in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1]. He is a faithful legionary who always follows orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Gael_E
string.body: Gael;A careless legionary who lost an important set of orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Vagion_E
string.body: Vagion;A member of the Red Fang in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1]. He has control over the Id research tool in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Uster_E
string.body: Uster;A High Priest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1]. He's constantly worried about the soldiers because of the potential dangers in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Piahna_E
string.body: Piana;A member of the Red Fang in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2]. He is angry about the Rakuri in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Macur_E
string.body: Makur;A member of the Red Fang in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2]. He is observing the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Penion_E
string.body: Penion;A member of the Red Fang at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3]. He does business with the Shugos to obtain money for the military.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ruok_E
string.body: Ruok;A Fatebound Legionary who can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1]. He observes the Dragonbound very closely, and has doubts about the Shugo who leads the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kitos_E
string.body: Kitus;A member of the Red Fang in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1]. His lack of motivation would imply that he has doubts about his choice of career.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Berenoos_E
string.body: Berenus;A Fatebound Legion Centurion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2]. He believes that Skurvs and Kobolds are always filthy, no matter where you encounter them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Quage_E
string.body: Quage;A Fatebound Legion Centurion at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F3]. He has outstanding expertise in planning operations and analysing the enemy's movements. However, he doesn't notice it when other people steal his achievements.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Navrei_E
string.body: Navrei;A Scout Leader of the Fatebound Legion who is isolated at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F2]. He is making attack plans even though he's surrounded by enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ivolk_E
string.body: Ivolk;A member of the Red Fang who is possessed by thoughts of becoming famous through his achievements. He isn't afraid to manipulate reports in order to gain recognition either.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Beltane_E
string.body: Beltane;Fatebound Legion Tribunus in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Niame_E
string.body: Niame;Fatebound Legion Centurion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. He constantly gets defeated by the Elimination Squad of the 43rd Army and wants to take his revenge on them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Zair_E
string.body: Zair;A Fatebound Legionary who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. He wants to free his petrified comrades at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ulvali_E
string.body: Ulvari;Quartermaster of the Katalam Cleanup Squad in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1]. He is fully concentrated on his task of supplying drinking water and doesn't listen to the advice of others.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Elta_E
string.body: Elta;Fatebound Legion Centurion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Entita_E
string.body: Entita;Quartermaster of the Katalam Cleanup Squad in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. He has not yet understood that everything needs to be checked very carefully when working together with Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_wallring_E
string.body: Wallinerk;A subcontractor from Goldrinyerk Limited who works at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_1] taking care of the Eremion Ramparts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Detworing_E
string.body: Diturinerk;A Shugo who is only interested in money. He always wants the cheapest offer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Clrinrin_E
string.body: Klinrinerk;A Shugo who manages Goldrinyerk Limited's storehouse. He has no qualms about snatching items that have already been sold if it means he'll earn more kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Defeat_Drakan
string.body: Survivors of the 55th Unit;Defeated soldiers of the Tiamat Legion who are looking for comrades-in-arms to take revenge on the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Watering_E
string.body: Waterinerk;Taps spring water in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1]. Nobody knows if the water that he sells is drinkable at all.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Pandaroong_E
string.body: Pandarunerk;President of Goldrinyerk Limited who lives in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. He is in very high standing, but the expensive clothes and accessories that he wears don't really suit him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Storing_E
string.body: Storinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's subsidiary storehouse company. He used to work in the railway sector.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Railring_E
string.body: Railirinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's subsidiary rail company. He is responsible for supervising the tracks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Roadring_E
string.body: Rodrinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's subsidiary rail company. He is in charge of tracks maintenance, but too lazy to work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sparing_E
string.body: Sperinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's port project.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Offiring_E
string.body: Opirinerk;A Shugo employed by Goldrinyerk Limited. He is responsible for office work at Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Iring_E
string.body: Illinerk;A Shugo merchant. He's very ill but can't get treatment because he has no money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Albaring_E
string.body: Albarinerk;A Shugo from Goldrinyerk Limited's subsidiary recruitment company. He recruits and manages the staff required for Goldrinyerk Limited's projects.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Marti_Drakan
string.body: Defeated Mati;A defeated Drakan who was part of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion and is now employed by Goldrinyerk Limited. He is very eager to take revenge on the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Muti_E
string.body: Muti;A Kobold labourer employed by a subcontractor of Goldrinyerk Limited. He lost his tickets for his journey home.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_ShulackGuard_01
string.body: Shulack Sentinel in the Autonomous District;A Shulack mercenary employed by Goldrinyerk Limited. His task is to oversee the labourers in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1], but he isn't particularly committed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_ShulackGuard_02
string.body: Shulack Gatekeeper;A Shulack mercenary hired by Kaberinerk in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A3_1]. His task is to guard the materials, but he isn't particularly committed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_ShulackGuard_03
string.body: Shulack Gatekeeper;A Shulack mercenary hired by Wallinerk in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_1]. His task is to guard the materials, but he isn't particularly committed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Nursringring_E
string.body: Nurserinerk;A nurse at the Goldrinyerk Central Hospital in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. She is responsible for medications.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dieroonroon_Greenhat
string.body: Dairunerk;A Shugo who works for the Green Hat Alliance environmental association. He is observing the activities of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Watering_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Krering_E
string.body: Krerunerk;A subcontractor of Goldrinyerk Limited who manages the Krerunerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sapparing_E
string.body: Saphirunerk;A Goldrinyerk Limited subcontractor who manages the Saphirunerk Farm.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Devring_E
string.body: Debrinerk;Katalam Development Chief in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Goriring_E
string.body: Goririnerk;A member of the Katalam Accountant's Guild who is active in the financial sector. He even does business with the Dragonbound if he can get any profit out of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ezaring_E
string.body: Isarinerk;A member of the Katalam Accountant's Guild who is active in the financial sector.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Stelman_E
string.body: Stelman;Commander of the Stelman Fatebound Protectorate. He is the most senior Tribunus. He is generous and rash and has many followers, but many enemies as well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Phone_E
string.body: Phon;The Tribunus of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is pedantic, precise, daring and has a large circle of acquaintances. Sometimes he also uses his authority for private purposes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Pepe_E
string.body: Pepe;The commander of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He comes from a poor family, but he is clever and grasps things very quickly. He is a rival of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Portis_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Portis_E
string.body: Portis;High Priest of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He comes from a respected family, is arrogant and looks down on the followers of Pepe with disdain. He is a rival of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Pepe_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tanyon_E
string.body: Tanion;Soldier from the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sister01_E
string.body: Klara;Phon's sister. Phon spoils her, so she is somewhat arrogant. There is something that seems preoccupy her, but she is trying to hide it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Daughter01_E
string.body: Ronej;Portis' daughter. She is rude, probably because Portis spoils her too much.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard10_L
string.body: Teron;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_B2_v10]. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_B2_v10].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard11_L
string.body: Stifon;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_A4_v11]. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_A4_v11].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard12_L
string.body: Konon;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_C1_v12]. He is friends with members of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_C1_v12].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard13_L
string.body: Feriander;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v13]. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v13].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard14_L
string.body: Shibron;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14]. He is friends with members of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard15_L
string.body: Kleon;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15]. He will only appear if Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard16_L
string.body: Kilon;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v16]. He will appear if the Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v16].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard17_L
string.body: Timoleon;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17]. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard18_L
string.body: Knemus;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v18]. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v18].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard19_L
string.body: Pormio;The Captain of the Katalam Patrol who is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v19]. He is friends with members of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He will only appear if the Elyos have conquered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v19].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard10_D
string.body: Herbo;Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_B2_v10]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_B2_v10].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard11_D
string.body: Tobald;He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_A4_v11]. As Captain of the Katalam Cleanup Squad, he is in charge of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_A4_v11].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard12_D
string.body: Preydis;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_C1_v12]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_C1_v12].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard13_D
string.body: Torpin;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v13]. He openly appears if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v13].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard14_D
string.body: Olaf;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard15_D
string.body: Ube;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard16_D
string.body: Igrit;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad, who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v16]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v16].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard17_D
string.body: Helga;The Captain of the Asmodians' Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F1]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard18_D
string.body: Rorik;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v18] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v18].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard19_D
string.body: Rolf;The Captain of the Asmodian Katalam Cleanup Squad who commands the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v19] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F4_v19].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Babanu_E
string.body: Babanu;A Drekanu who lost his house because of Goldrinyerk Limited. He wants to get building materials from the Shugos so he can build a new house.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Latkel_E
string.body: Latkel;Asmodian Captain in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start]. He can take you to the Steel Wall Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Demades_E
string.body: Demades;A commander of the Elyos posted in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start]. He takes you to the Steel Wall Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Chakering_E
string.body: Chakerunerk;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He loves kokonats.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Perinrin_E
string.body: Perinerk;An administrator of the Lumber Camp who heads up the Perinerk Company. He complains about little things and moans a lot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mycenae_E
string.body: Mikene;A follower of Pepe in the Katalam Vanguard in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rasir_E
string.body: Rasir;He is part of the Portis Protectorate. As he doesn't like to take on responsibilities, he always attempts to follow orders to the letter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Minoa_E
string.body: Minoa;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He is an idealist and proud to be part of the Green Hat Alliance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Pillriko_E
string.body: Philiko;A member of the Portis Protectorate. He seems to know exactly what he does and doesn't like, and always sticks to his first opinion once he's formed it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Skillros_E
string.body: Skilros;A follower of Pepe and member of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad. He is hard-working and very mindful of his responsibilities.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Jikiring_E
string.body: Jikirunerk;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He can only concentrate on one thing at a time and has a strong sense of justice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Gurtoo_E
string.body: Gogor;A Gurriki who used to live in Katalam and was driven out when the Lumber Camp was set up. He can be found in a shelter near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Ripides_E
string.body: Lipides;A priest of the Order of Priests. He was dispatched to the Katalam Research Group's camp in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Roeris_E
string.body: Roeris;One of Pepe's followers. He is investigating the cause of the pollution in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Tauros_E
string.body: Tauros;A Scout from the Patrol's Guard Post of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Killros_E
string.body: Killros;Is investigating Rune Tribe on orders of the High Priest. He is with the Katalam Ruins Researchers in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sopocles_E
string.body: Sophocles;The assistant of a famous scientist. He researched the Petralith, and is now at the Katalam Ruins Researcher Camp in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rake_E
string.body: Rake;He can be found at the Patrol's observation post by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5]. He is part of the Gold Feather Legion's Attack Squad, and is a very sensitive individual.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Thrasir_E
string.body: Thrasir;A Centurion of the Katalam Patrol, stationed at the Patrol's observation post at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rubyring_E
string.body: Rubininerk;A subcontractor of Goldrinyerk Limited who manages the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1]. He heads up the Rubininerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Chororing_E
string.body: Choroshunerk;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He is convinced that he is a kokonat expert.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Pahel_E
string.body: Pahel;A member of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is stationed in the Katalam Cleanup Squad's attack camp in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Daltra_E
string.body: Daltra;He is part of the Stelman Protectorate and is stationed at the Katalam Cleanup Squad's attack camp in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Meab_E
string.body: Meav;A member of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is careless and often forgets important things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mabran_E
string.body: Mabran;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He does not tolerate injustice and has set convictions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rogring_E
string.body: Rogrinerk;An administrator of the Lumber Camp who heads up the Rogrinerk Company. He always worries a lot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Kamoring_E
string.body: Kamochin;A member of the Green Hat Alliance. He is foolish, in many respects.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Aulraky_E
string.body: Aulaki;A Strigik who used to live in Katalam and was driven out when the Lumber Camp was set up. He can be found in a shelter near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rimona_E
string.body: Limona;She is part of the Stelman Protectorate and is stationed at the Dredgion Researcher Camp at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_D]. She is a woman who is cold-blooded with her enemies on the one hand but warm-hearted with her own people on the other.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Tagoras_E
string.body: Tagoras;A member of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is stationed at the Dredgion Researcher camp at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Gamien_E
string.body: Gamien;A Scout from the Cleanup Squad's Guard Post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Notis_E
string.body: Notis;Is investigating the Rune Tribe on orders of the High Priest. He can be found at the Katalam Ramparts Researcher Camp in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Noreuntu_E
string.body: Noruntu;The assistant of a famous scientist. He researched the Petralith, and is now at the Katalam Ramparts Researcher Camp in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Bodel_E
string.body: Bodel;He is a radical member of the Red Fang, and is stationed at the Cleanup Squad's observation post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Otr_E
string.body: Otro;A Centurion of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He can be found at the Katalam Cleanup Squad's observation post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Nargel_E
string.body: Nargel;He is part of the Stelman Protectorate. He is a perfectionist.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mairing_E
string.body: Mairinerk;A subcontractor of Goldrinyerk Limited who manages the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4]. He heads up the Mairinerk Company.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_G1_CoconasBasket
string.body: Abandoned Kokonat Basket;A basket of kokonats, harvested by the Skurvs working on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_RunePiece_1
string.body: Ruins for making a rubbing;Ruins of enormous Ramparts, can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7]. They display traces of the Rune Tribe. You can make a rubbing here.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_E_RuneDiary
string.body: Old Diary of the Rune;An old diary found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3]. It recounts the history of the Rune Tribe.

string.body: Katalam Soil;Soil that can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F].

string.body: Fallen Guardian[pl:"Guardians"];The corpse of a Guardian. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G2].

string.body: Lost Metal Parts;Metal parts from the clearing machines used by the Saphirunerk Company in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.body: Lost Metal Parts;Metal parts from the clearing machines used by the Saphirunerk Company in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.body: Ore Mine Cart[pl:"Carts"];These mine carts can be found everywhere in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7]. They contain mined ore.

string.body: Box[pl:"Boxes"] containing Mining Tools;A box that contains mining tools and that can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Akaia_E
string.body: Akaia;A Petralith Researcher. He is currently at the Reian Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A3] for research purposes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Kinor_E
string.body: Kinor;A Petralith Researcher. He is currently at the Reian Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A3] for research purposes.

string.body: Letterinerk;A messenger who went missing in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B6] carrying letters from Nezekan and Triniel .

string.body: Ruins that are ready for making a rubbing;Ruins of enormous Ramparts, can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7]. They display traces of the Rune Tribe. You can make a rubbing here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_E2_ShulackBox
string.body: Building Material Chest;A chest with building materials stolen by the Shulacks the Goldrinyerk suppliers had employed. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_OP_Railroad
string.body: Abandoned Track[pl:"Tracks"];Abandoned tracks that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_G1_TrashHeap
string.body: Rubbish pile;A pile of rubbish found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1]. It poses an obstacle for the tapping of spring water.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv14_Exchange_Cera
string.body: Bekasis;An Elyos Ceranium merchant in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14]. He will only appear if the Elyos have occupied the defence base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv17_Seller_Cera
string.body: Benjarinerk;Elyos medallion merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17]. He only appears if the Elyos have occupied the defence base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv14_Exchange_Cera
string.body: Inharet;An Asmodian Ceranium merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v14]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have occupied the defence base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv17_Seller_Cera
string.body: Dentirunerk;An Asmodian medallion merchant in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_F1_v17]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have occupied the defence base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Borneo_E
string.body: Borneo;A High Priest who was dispatched to Katalam. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF5A_NPC_Q_WondedGuardian
string.body: Injured Guardian[pl:"Guardians"];South of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] there are still some Guardians who were injured in the war between the Elyos and Asmodians in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Edis_E
string.body: Edis;One of Pepe's followers and member of the Gold Feather Legion. He is observing the Reians in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A4] to find out if they're joining forces with the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_L_BrokenWall
string.body: Crumbled Wall;A crumbled wall in the southern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] which represents a security risk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pregin_E
string.body: Pregion;One of Pepe's followers and member of the Gold Feather Legion. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_A4_KahrunShield
string.body: Deactivated Statue of Binding;A statue that was erected so the Reians could use the Power of Binding. It is currently deactivated. If the Power of Binding is activated, it will not be possible to fight in the affected area. The statue can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Adiel_E
string.body: Adiel;A member of the Sanctum Expeditionary Knights. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3]. He wants to eliminate the Dragonbound in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Rokaus_E
string.body: Rokaus;One of Pepe's followers and member of the Gold Feather Legion. He is getting ready to infiltrate the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5] so he can spy on the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_B5_FanaIdgel
string.body: Blue Core[pl:"Cubes"];A blue container filled with Idgel. The Dragonbound in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5] call it the Idgel Core.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Rigas_E
string.body: Rigas;He is a part of the Portis Protectorate and observes the Beritra Army from the Patrol's scout post at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Halluan_E
string.body: Halluan;A scholar of old civilisations who is researching the life of the Rune Tribe at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Sores_E
string.body: Sores;One of Pepe's followers and member of the Gold Feather Legion. He is researching Id in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_B7_EmptyEdgel
string.body: Empty Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];A cube that used to contain Idgel and is now empty. It was found north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Kiker_E
string.body: Kiker;A Guardian. He is supposedly looking for Kahrun but his affiliation is unknown. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Kaias_E
string.body: Kaias;One of Pepe's followers and part of the Gold Feather Legion. He is investigating the Beritra Army at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Repta_E
string.body: Repta;He is investigating the Beritra Army with the help of Kaias and Iroas. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Iroas_E
string.body: Iroas;One of Pepe's followers and member of the Gold Feather Legion. He is investigating the Beritra Army at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Delnutan_E
string.body: Delnutan;A High Priest who was dispatched to Katalam. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Borb_E
string.body: Borb;A Fatebound Legionary who is secretly observing the Reians in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A2] to find out whether they want to assist the Elyos in an attack against the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_OP_D_BrokenWall
string.body: Crumbled Wall;A crumbled wall in the eastern part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] which represents a risk to security.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_NPC_Q_WondedArchon
string.body: Injured[pl:"Injured"] Archon[pl:"Archons"];Archons who were left east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] and injured in the war between the Elyos and the Asmodians in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Nosmon_E
string.body: Nosmon;He is a follower of Phon and part of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He can be found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_A2_KahrunShield
string.body: Deactivated Statue of Binding;A statue that was erected so the Reians could use the Power of Binding. It is currently deactivated. If the Power of Binding is activated, it will not be possible to fight in the affected area. The statue can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Kellran_E
string.body: Kellran;He is one of Phon's successors and part of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3], and wants to eliminate the Dragonbound in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Raky_E
string.body: Laki;He is a follower of Phon and part of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is planning to infiltrate the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5] and find out more about the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Gregin_E
string.body: Gregin;He is one of Stelman's successors and part of the Stelman Protectorate. He wants to teach the Balaur near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6] a lesson because they are preventing the Asmodians from conquering Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Shurelon_E
string.body: Shurelron;A scholar of old civilisations who is researching the life of the Rune Tribe at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Kadine_E
string.body: Kadine;One of Phon's followers who works for the military authorities and researches Id on the side. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_B1_EmptyEdgel
string.body: Empty Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];A cube that used to contain Idgel and is now empty. It was found north of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pagut_E
string.body: Pagut;An Archon. He is supposedly looking for Kahrun but doesn't look like a member of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Ranis_E
string.body: Lanis;He is a follower of Phon and is part of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is handling territorial expansion for the military authorities in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2], but is investigating the Beritra Army and reporting to Phon at the same time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Serip_E
string.body: Serif;He is investigating the Beritra Army in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2] with Stelman's support. Lanis and Balbrin are helping him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Balbrin_E
string.body: Balbrin;He is a follower of Phon and is part of the Red Fang Underground Troop. He is handling territorial expansion for the military authorities in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2], but is investigating the Beritra Army and reporting to Phon at the same time.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Asir_E
string.body: Asir;A member of the Reian tribe at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3]. He wants to help the members of this tribe who were brainwashed by the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Raten_E
string.body: Laten;A member of the Reian Tribe who was brainwashed by the Dragonbound. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Hagnon_E
string.body: Hagnon;A Reian citizen. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Akad_E
string.body: Akad;One of Tiamat's Id Researchers, who can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_F]. He feels responsible for the fact that his colleagues have turned into zombies.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_F_TiamatBox
string.body: Akad's Mysterious Lockbox;A lockbox belonging to Tiamat's Id researcher, Akad, which can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_F]. He hid his research results in the lockbox so the Beritra Army couldn't take them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mooling_Silverlin
string.body: Murinerk;An Advisor of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Jialinlin_Silverlin
string.body: Jiarinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Minggiling_Silverlin
string.body: Mingirinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Joongling_Silverlin
string.body: Jirlinerk;An Advisor of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Bialinlin_Silverlin
string.body: Biarinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dunaling_Silverlin
string.body: Dunarinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Taureun_Greenhat
string.body: Taureun;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Bios_Greenhat
string.body: Vios;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Irin_Greenhat
string.body: Airin;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G2].

string.body: Guniaro;An advisor of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.body: Barek;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lily_Greenhat
string.body: Airin;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Silverlin_Join
string.body: Danurinerk;Recruiter for Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Silverlin_Join
string.body: Dumurinerk;Recruiter for Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Greenhat_Join
string.body: Manurunerk;A recruiter of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Greenhat_Join
string.body: Sunarunerk;A recruiter of the Green Hat Alliance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sootaling_Silverlin
string.body: Sutarinerk;An administrator of Silverine Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Malinlin_Silverlin
string.body: Marinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Gumaling_Silverlin
string.body: Gumarinerk;An Administrator of Silverine Limited in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ubarung_Greenhat
string.body: Ubarunerk;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Argarung_Greenhat
string.body: Algarunerk;A representative of the Green Hat Alliance in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Idgel_Q39601
string.body: Idium Stalk[pl:"Stalks"];Gleaming Idium in the form of a stalk, which can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2] as well as by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wood_Q39605
string.body: Pile of Wood;A pile of hard and sturdy-looking pieces of wood. You can find these piles of wood in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3] as well as in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wall_Q39608
string.body: Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of the Eremion Ramparts;Fragments of the Eremion Ramparts, which can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4] and at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Coconas_Q39702
string.body: Kokonat Tree[pl:"Trees"];A tree of round and tasty kokonats. The fruits contain a sweet juice. It can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Garbage_Q39708
string.body: Rubbish bag[pl:"bags"];A bag containing rubbish. It seems to have been dumped a long time ago. You can find it near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4] as well as near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E7].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_Bottle_Q39712
string.body: Water Bottle[pl:"Bottles"];A sealed bottle containing drinking water. Upon closer inspection, however, the water is unclean and stinks as well. The bottle can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dv8_Exchange_Cera
string.body: Pungt;A Ceranium Administration Officer. He can be found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lv8_Exchange_Cera
string.body: Cebes;A Ceranium Administration Officer. He can be found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pepe_E
string.body: Tribunus Pepe;Tribunus of the Gold Feather Legion

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Portis_E
string.body: High Priest Portis;High Priest of the Order. He is supported by the Portis Protectorate, which was named after him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Stelman_E
string.body: Chief Tribunus Stelman;Senior Tribunus of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. He is supported by the Stelman Protectorate, which was named after him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Phone_E
string.body: Commander Phon;Commander of the Red Fang Underground Troop. His organisation almost entirely fell apart after the destruction of Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Greenhat_Reward
string.body: Shont;A steward of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Greenhat].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Greenhat_Reward
string.body: Basar;A steward of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Greenhat].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Silverlin_Reward
string.body: Dongrunerk;A steward of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Silverlin].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Silverlin_Reward
string.body: Borinerk;A steward of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Silverlin].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5aREsolo_RuneBook
string.body: Research Journal of the Rune Tribe;A book which contains records of the Rune Tribe's research, compiled by the Beritra Head Researcher.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IN_NPC01
string.body: Otherworld Faeries;These beings from another world are looking for Daevas to rescue [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IU_NPC01]. Elyos can find the faeries at the following locations: [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31],[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. Asmodians can find the faeries at the following locations: [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IU_NPC01
string.body: IU;An Otherworld Faerie with a dreamy singing voice. The greedy circus director [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_NMD_03] captured her because he wants to use her to make money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_TELEPORT_NPC01
string.body: Aseda;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IN_NPC01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_FOBJ01
string.body: Sturdy Iron Chain;Iron chain used to seal the cage in which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_IU_NPC01] is imprisoned. If you destroy the iron chain, IU will help you in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E
string.body: Hadius;An Elyos who has been deployed to the Katalam Underground. He is trying to emulate [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E], despite his lack of skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E
string.body: Kurius;Elyos Captain who was deployed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1]. He leads the Elyos forces in the Katalam Underground. He is the superior of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E] and is extremely ambitious.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Dures_E
string.body: Dyures;He is observing the battle against the Balaur in the Katalam Underground.[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E] is his supervisor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Liponia_E
string.body: Liponia;She researches ancient cultures and is currently investigating the relics of the Rune Tribe. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E] is her supervisor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E
string.body: Brif;A Captain leading the Asmodian forces in the Underground. He is the twin brother of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E]. Brif willingly accepted the mission in the Katalam Underground so he could boost his image again.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E
string.body: Otur;An Asmodian who has a quiet and cautious character, who was deployed to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1]. He volunteered for service in the underground as he was worried about his twin brother, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Merde_E
string.body: Merne;He is observing the battle against the Balaur in the Katalam Underground.[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E] is his supervisor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Nibella_E
string.body: Nivella;She researches ancient cultures and is currently investigating the relics of the Rune Tribe. Although she is working for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E], she prefers to pursue her own interests.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Broringring_E
string.body: Borinerk;A representative of the Kuporinerk Company. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Pudirung_E
string.body: Mampfrunerk;He manages food rations and is very proud of his range of foodstuffs. He can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_M1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Rashiv_E
string.body: Lashiv;Member of the Beritra Army. He was captured by a group of survivors of Tiamat's Legion and appears to be very angry.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Gritt_E
string.body: Gritt;A Tiamat soldier captured by the 5th Unit of the Beritra Army. It seems as though he knows about some secret matters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T2_Document
string.body: Confidential Document on the Desk;A confidential document from Grit that was left behind on the desk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T2_Grave
string.body: Sealed Rune Grave;A Rune Tribe grave which has a warning inscribed in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_RuneSlate_1
string.body: Weathered Rune Stone Plate;Old legends of the Rune Tribe have been etched into it. Apparently you will find a ruin somewhere if you head in the direction of the temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_RuneSlate_2
string.body: Old Rune Stone Plate;Legends of the Rune Tribe have been etched into it. Apparently you will find a ruin somewhere if you head in the direction of the tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T1_Document
string.body: Confidential Document on the Desk;A confidential document from Grit that was left on the desk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T1_Grave
string.body: Sealed Grave;A Rune Tribe grave which has a warning inscribed in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_H1_Stone
string.body: Broken Rune Jewellery;Broken pieces of jewellery that can be found in the Katalam Underground.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_A1_Plant
string.body: Fresh Kataluna;A special plant that only grows in the Katalam Underground.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Acterun_E
string.body: Aktorunerk;A highly suspicious Shugo whose true selfis not known to anybody. He seems to be injured for some reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_Idium
string.body: Subterranean Idium Vein;Idium that has been found in the Catalam Underground. It seems to be purer than the Idium on the surface.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Avsada_E
string.body: Avsada;One of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion who was captured in northern Katalam at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. It seems as though Avsada knows about important proceedings.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Egant_E
string.body: Egant;A survivors of Tiamat's Legion who was captured in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in northern Katalam. It seems as though he knows about some secret matters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Seller_Cera
string.body: Shukrunerk;Caretaker for Ceranium medals. He advises you to exchange the Ceranium medals in the Katalam Underground.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Timarchus_E
string.body: Timarkus;An Elyos of the Zephyr Daevas who is observing the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Klaf_E
string.body: Klav;An Asmodian spy. He was taken prisoner by the Elyos, and he has important information about the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Chaea_G
string.body: Kaiah;He is the administrator of the Sillus Fortress and part of the Katalam Patrol of the Elyos. He will only appear if the Elyos have captured the Sillus Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tenisian_G
string.body: Tenisian;He is the administrator of the Prades Fortress and part of the Katalam Patrol of the Elyos. He will only appear if the Elyos have captured the Prades Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Resco_G
string.body: Lesco;He is the administrator of the Bassen Fortress and part of the Katalam Patrol of the Elyos. He will only appear if the Elyos have captured the Bassen Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_OP_L_Dike_E
string.body: Dike;She is the fourth agent of Kaisinel. She is handling things in Katalam in the place of Lord Kaisinel. She is blind.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Rumela_E
string.body: Rumella;A guard of the Katalam Patrol. She is on patrol in the Katalam Underground and gives out special missions. She only appears between 6 PM and 2 AM.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Undgankt_E
string.body: Ungand;An Asmodian from the Archon of Dusk who is observing the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Latis_E
string.body: Latis;An Elyos spy. He was taken prisoner by the Asmodians, and he has important information about the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sigmund_G
string.body: Sigmund;He is the administrator of the Sillus Fortress and part of the Katalam Cleanup Squad of the Asmodians. He will only appear if the Asmodians have captured the Sillus Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kaimir_G
string.body: Kaimeer;He is the administrator of the Prades Fortress and part of the Katalam Cleanup Squad of the Asmodians. He will only appear if the Asmodians have captured the Prades Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Niber_G
string.body: Niver;He is the administrator of the Bassen Fortress and part of the Katalam Cleanup Squad of the Asmodians. He will only appear if the Asmodians have captured the Bassen Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_OP_D_Skuldun_E
string.body: Skuldun;The fourth agent of Marchutan. He is handling things in Katalam in the place of Lord Marchutan. He has a talking figure on his shoulder.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hultum_E
string.body: Hultum;A guard of the Katalam Patrol. He is on patrol in the Katalam Underground and gives out special missions. He only appears between 6 PM and 2 AM.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_Switch_4
string.body: Fourth Release Mechanism;A mechanism found inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all]. It can be used to open one of the doors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_Switch_5
string.body: Fifth Release Mechanism;A mechanism found inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all]. It can be used to open one of the doors.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_Switch_6
string.body: Sixth Release Mechanism;A mechanism found inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all]. It can be used to open one of the doors.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine
string.body: Ancient Weapon Prototype;It is assumed that Idgel was used to power it. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Amalde_E
string.body: Amalde;A legionary of the Katalam Patrol who is stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. He is looking for a suitable person who can obtain information from the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Kanix_E
string.body: Kanix;An informant from the Katalam Patrol who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]. He harbours a grudge against the members of the Beritra Army at the Sauro War Depot who killed his comrades. He has been here since the passage from the Sauro War Depot to South Katalam was blocked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sibeldum_E
string.body: Sibeldum;A legionary of the Katalam Cleanup Squad who is stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3]. He is looking for a suitable person who can obtain information from the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Giriltia_E
string.body: Giriltia;An informant from the Katalam Cleanup Squad who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]. She wants the Sauro War Depot assignments to be carried out as quickly as possible. She has been staying here since the passage from the Sauro War Depot to South Katalam was blocked.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_02_Alkatron_E
string.body: Alkatron Vanguard;These explorers can be encountered when you travel from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_D] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_E_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_02_Dintanum_E
string.body: Dintanum Vanguard;These explorers can be encountered when you travel from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_L] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_E_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Rune Tribe Refuge Teleporter;A teleporter found at the end of the passage to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_T2] in the Katalam Underground. It is linked to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDVritra_Base_Enter
string.body: Sauro War Depot Corridor;A corridor which was opened by Daevas in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance] after the passage in South Katalam was blocked. It is connected to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller
string.body: Amake;An Elyos special designs merchant stationed at the 81st Garrison. He sells designs that can be used to make mysterious crystals. He will only appear if the Elyos have captured the 81st Garrison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller
string.body: Haubig;An Asmodian special designs merchant stationed at the 81st Garrison. He sells designs that can be used to make mysterious crystals. He will only appear if the Asmodians conquer the 81st Garrison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_01_Theano_E
string.body: Theano;An agent of the Elyos who belongs to the Zephyr Daevas. Since the destruction of Katalam, she reports regularly on the situation at Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_01_Rohellein_E
string.body: Rohellein;An Asmodian agent who is a member of the Archon of Dusk. Since the destruction of Katalam, she reports regularly on the current situation at Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start
string.body: Tomb Entrance Key Box;A key box that can be found at the Tranquil Crossroads in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all]. It may contain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_b] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_c].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sabran_F
string.body: Sabran;A special administration officer. He is in charge of the Daevas who are infiltrating the Durga Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Elatha_F
string.body: Elatha;A special administration officer. He is in charge of the Daevas who are infiltrating the Durga Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04_Drakanbox
string.body: Durga Legion Supplies;These can be obtained in the Durga Dredgion's supply depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_IDLDF5b_TD_Drakan_Fighter
string.body: Kvash;An imprisoned Balaur who is being held in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. He has information about the Balaur units that were dispatched to the Steel Wall Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_IDLDF5b_TD_Drakan_Fighter_Da
string.body: Captured Kvash;An imprisoned Balaur who is being held in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. He has information about the Balaur units that were dispatched to the Steel Wall Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF5_TD_Drum
string.body: Lysander's Air Defence Artillery;Air defence artillery at the Steel Wall Bastion. It can be used to shoot down the Beritra Army's assault engines.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF5_TD_Drum_D
string.body: Granir's Air Defence Artillery;Air defence artillery at the Steel Wall Bastion. It can be used to shoot down the Beritra Army's assault engines.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv15_Exchange_Wing
string.body: Ararinerk;An armour merchant in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15]. He will only appear if the Elyos have captured the 85th Garrison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv15_Exchange_Wing
string.body: Betorunerk;An armour merchant in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have captured the 85th Garrison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IN_NPC01
string.body: Otherworld Faeries;These beings from another world are looking for Daevas to rescue [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IU_NPC01]. Elyos can find the faeries at the following locations: On the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A1] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. Asmodians can find the faeries at the following locations: On the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A2] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IU_NPC01
string.body: Ariate;An Otherworld Faerie with a dreamy singing voice. The greedy circus director [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_WORLD_NMD_03] abducted her because he wants to use her to make money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_TELEPORT_NPC01
string.body: Aseda;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IN_NPC01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_FOBJ01
string.body: Sturdy Iron Chain;An iron chain used to seal the cage in which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAsteria_IU_WORLD_IU_NPC01] is imprisoned. If you destroy the iron chain, Ariate will help you in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_White_Shugo_Candyringring_L
string.body: Lovelinerk;Missionary of Love in Sanctum. She teaches Daevas the secret of the special gift. She is related to Loverinerk from Asmodae, but the two of them don't get along that well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_White_Shugo_Candyrinrin_D
string.body: Loverinerk;Missionary of Love in Pandaemonium. She teaches Daevas the secret of the special gift. She is related to Lovelinerk from Elysea, but the two of them don't get along that well.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_treasurebox
string.body: Treasure Chest[pl:"Chests"];Created by alchemists of the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_01]. You can open special treasure chests using gold keys and regular treasure chests using copper keys.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_01
string.body: Erusael Organisation;An organisation of alchemists from the Otherworld. This organisation donates [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_treasurebox] to the Elyos on the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L], as well as to the Asmodians by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A2] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D].

string.body: Calobris;An innkeep who is mixing cocktails at the Summer Fair.

string.body: Rezar;An innkeep who is mixing cocktails at the Summer Fair.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Event_Scrooge_l_4
string.body: Scrooge;Host of the Summer Fair. Others often refer to him as being a miser, but he has recently decided to be a more generous employer.

string.body: Scrooge;Host of the Summer Fair. Others often refer to him as being a miser, but he has recently decided to be a more generous employer.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Rune Shield Tower Corridor;Entrances are located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01], and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_H_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance]. The corridor was built by the Beritra Army so it could invade the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03].

string.body: Kardegatt;A member of the Munin Search Party on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF5_TD_War_Latkel_E
string.body: Latkel;Asmodian Captain, who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD_War]. He has been ordered to take back the battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF5_TD_War_Demades_E
string.body: Demades;Elyos Captain, who can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD_War]. He has been ordered to take back the battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02_Entrance_In_L
string.body: Oceanos;Admissions officer for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02]. Appears in the Krotan Refuge when the Magos Landing Site reaches boost level 6 and the Elyos conquer the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02_Entrance_In_L
string.body: Ombrios;Admissions officer for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02]. Appears in the Kysis Fortress when the Magos Landing Site reaches boost level 6 and the Elyos conquer the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02_Entrance_In_L
string.body: Iapetus;Admissions officer for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02]. Appears in the Miren Fortress when the Magos Landing Site reaches boost level 6 and the Elyos conquer the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30].

string.body: Grendel;Admissions officer for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02]. Appears in the Krotan Refuge when the Tokanu Landing Site reaches boost level 6 and the Asmodians conquer the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Tuata_E
string.body: Tuata;A Shadow Judge sent to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Randwer_E
string.body: Landver;A guard protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Fafner_E
string.body: Fafner;An Asmodian spy disguised as a Drakie, who is monitoring the Beritra Army's activities. He has hidden in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF3_DragonRobot_Q24054
string.body: Invasion Weapon[pl:"Weapons"] of the 45th Army;A weapon built for the invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_FOBJ_DefenderRecord
string.body: Records on the Protectress;Ancient records on Oriata, the Relic Protectress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4b_Yupitinea_E
string.body: Protectress Oriata;She protects Siel's Relic and can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A4] in Tiamaranta. It is said that she is a force to be reckoned with.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF1a_Ribanon_E
string.body: Ribanon;A scientist who researches energy in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF1A_name]. He is a master of forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Barantina_E
string.body: Barantina;A Scout posted in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009]. She volunteered to monitor the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Javlantia
string.body: Yavlantia;Captain of the Cleanup Squad who is doing missions for the Elyos in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbGateL2_FOBJ_IdDevice
string.body: Rift Teleporter;A Teleporter with which Hyperion can be moved through the Abyss Gate. It is powered by Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF3_DragonRobot_Q14054
string.body: Invasion Weapon of the 45th Army;The Beritra Army brought this machine through a rift in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009] and is hiding it there.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_MagicAmp
string.body: Heart Sensor;A device used to locate wellsprings.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_LavaRock_RiderM
string.body: Explosive Rock;This rock appears once the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Monster_Q10062A] near the Heart of Wrath has been eliminated.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_TiamatDie
string.body: Tiamat's Body;The remains of Balaur Lord Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_IdPiece
string.body: Concentrated Id Crystal;A crystal that formed in the place where Siel's Relic and Lord Israphel vanished.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbGateD2_FOBJ_IdDevice
string.body: Rift Teleporter;A Teleporter with which Hyperion can be moved through the Abyss Gate. It is powered by Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Crack_RiderM

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbGateL2_FOBJ_IdDeviceBroken
string.body: Broken Rift Teleporter;The rift teleporter is broken and unusable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDYupitinea
string.body: Oriata of the Past;To visit Oriata in the past, see [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4b_Yupitinea_E] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A4] in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill
string.body: Towering Idium;Energy source for the Shield Generators. It can be used to produce transparent Idium fragments.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_01
string.body: Eastern Shield Generator;A generator in the east part of the Rune Shield Tower. It can be charged with Idium Fragments up to level 3, which can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_02
string.body: Western Shield Generator;A generator in the west part of the Rune Shield Tower. It can be charged with Idium Fragments up to level 3, which can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_04
string.body: Northern Shield Generator;A generator in the north part of the Rune Shield Tower. It can be charged with Idium Fragments up to level 3, which can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Box_Fill].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_FlowerShugo
string.body: Florinerk;A Shugo, and considered the finest florist in Atreia. He is in the city to help with the festival.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_FOBJ_Wday_Flowershop
string.body: Stall;A stall where Florinerk sells flowers. The air is filled with their wonderful fragrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_shugof_snow
string.body: Snorinerk;She loves the snow and hands out [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a] to Daevas in town.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_shugom_snow
string.body: Snorunerk;This Shugo is friend of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugof_snow]. You can give him 10 [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_l_world_event_opportunity_snowball] in exchange for one [%dic:STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_snowman
string.body: Snowman;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugof_snow] made this snowman. She loves the snow so much, she wants to share her joy!
