string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF3_FOBJ_Q14150
string.body: Engraved Stone Tablet[pl:"Tablets"];A stone tablet carving depicting the life of an ancient civilization. It is located near Vaizel's Peak.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2A_Honglas
string.body: Hongras;A geologist in Hongras' Camp in Theobomos. The Marla Cave has awakened his curiosity.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF3_DragonObelisk_Q24054
string.body: Barrier Neutraliser;A system installed by the Balaur to weaken the Beluslan Aetheric Field. It is located in Bakarma Barracks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Illa_E
string.body: Illa;A spy from the Katalam Patrol who was sent to observe the Saphirunerk Plantation. She is investigating suspicious activity there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Boltion_E
string.body: Bolton;Leader of the Vanguard which intended to take on the Kaldor Patrol. He seems to be unsettled by something.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Tarminea_E
string.body: Tarminea;A surviving soldier from Kahrun's Escort. She knows where Kahrun is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Vatunum_E
string.body: Batunum;A spy from the Katalam Cleanup Squad who was sent to observe the Rubininerk Farm. He is investigating suspicious activity there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Kidisyan_E
string.body: Kidisian;Leader of the scouts who set off to investigate Kaldor. He seems distressed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Guiltan_E
string.body: Gilthan;A surviving soldier from Kahrun's Escort. He knows where Kahrun is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E
string.body: Morunerk;A businessman and inventor who was sent by the Saphirunerk Company, which belongs to Goldrinyerk Limited. He is currently staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] in Kaldor while he works on a new project. He adores Kinah and loves a good barter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E
string.body: Muderunerk;A businessman and inventor who was sent by the Rubininerk Company, which belongs to Goldrinyerk Limited. He is currently staying in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] in Kaldor while he works on a new project. He always insists that safety is the utmost priority.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q10101a
string.body: 702nd Invasion Corridor;An Abyss Gate opened by the Beritra Army using a generator in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q10100] on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5]. It seems to lead to another location.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q20101a
string.body: 701st Invasion Corridor;An Abyss Gate opened by the Beritra Army using a generator in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SensoryArea_Q20100] on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4]. It seems to lead to another location.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_FOBJ_Q10101b
string.body: 96th to 100th Invasion Corridors;Abyss Gates opened by the Beritra Army using a generator in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_SensoryArea_Q10101] in the Baruna Research Laboratory. They appear to lead to other locations.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q10101a
string.body: 31st Invasion Generator;Located in the main Beritra Army base in Akaron. It appears to be the key to the Invasion Corridor which leads to the 31st zone in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q10101b
string.body: 41st Invasion Generator;Located in the main Beritra Army base in Akaron. It appears to be the key to the Invasion Corridor which leads to the 41st zone in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q20101a
string.body: 33rd Invasion Generator;Located in the main Beritra Army base in Akaron. It appears to be the key to the Invasion Corridor which leads to the 33rd zone in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q20101b
string.body: 43rd Invasion Generator;Located in the main Beritra Army base in Akaron. It appears to be the key to the Invasion Corridor which leads to the 43rd zone in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Alphion_E
string.body: Alphion;Leader of the Kaldor Patrol. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start] and is ready to fight for the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Fendia_E
string.body: Pendia;An Ecologist who is working voluntarily in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start]. She is studying the flora and fauna in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Pintz_E
string.body: Pintor;Leader of the Kaldor Cleanup Squad. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] and is ready to fight for the Asmodians.

string.body: Popurunerk;A teleporter on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1]. He teleports you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Tree_Bellumus_Q24120A
string.body: Voice of Belemu;An Elim on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Bellumushill] in Morheim. Supports Elder Belemu and speaks on his behalf.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_LycanPrisoner_Q24123A
string.body: Isdanti;A Silver Mane Mau locked up in the prison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_2] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF2_Book_Q24122
string.body: Old[pl:"Old"] Notebook[pl:"Notebooks"];A report written by Pagimkin about his investigation into the missing Daevas. It is lying next to Pagimkin's corpse in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5_ID].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_L_Kahrun
string.body: Convalescent Kahrun;The leader of the Reians disappeared with Lord Kaisinel, but is said to have been spotted at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] in Akaron recently. Apparently he is holed up in a hideout while he recovers from his serious injuries.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_D_Kahrun
string.body: Convalescent Kahrun;The leader of the Reians disappeared with Lord Marchutan, but is said to have been spotted recently at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01]. Apparently he is holed up in a hideout while he recovers from his serious injuries.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_Door
string.body: Closed Door;This door gives off a strong Balaur energy. You ought to open it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_event_cube
string.body: Kodachi;A cube maker who crafts Gleaming Cubes. You can find him in Sanctum or Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Helgund_E
string.body: Helgund;Tribunus of the Darkseekers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D]. He is the leader of the Asmodian Akaron Patrol.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E
string.body: Elger;The Tribunus of the Death Song Legion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L], who leads the Elyos' Akaron Expedition Troop.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Aitu_E
string.body: Aitu;An Agent of the Archon of Dusk who is stationed in the Baruna Research Laboratory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Ctesibius_E
string.body: Cesibius;An Agent of the Zephyr Daevas who is stationed in the Baruna Research Laboratory. He is more of a researcher than a spy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Carley_E
string.body: Carley;Entry Assistant for the Pangaea fortress battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Astarin_E
string.body: Astarin;Entry Assistant for the Pangaea fortress battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Leaivink_E
string.body: Revink;Entry Assistant for the Pangaea fortress battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Krondel_E
string.body: Krondel;Entry Assistant for the Pangaea fortress battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_01_BelosAg_E
string.body: Belus Informant;An informant stationed at the starting point of the Pangaea fortress battle. He will keep you updated on how the battle is progressing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_02_AspidaAg_E
string.body: Aspida Informant;An informant stationed at the starting point of the Pangaea fortress battle. He will keep you updated on how the battle is progressing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_03_AthantosAg_E
string.body: Athanos Informant;An informant stationed at the starting point of the Pangaea fortress battle. He will keep you updated on how the battle is progressing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_04_DysilonAg_E
string.body: Deylon Informant;An informant stationed at the starting point of the Pangaea fortress battle. He will keep you updated on how the battle is progressing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Sub_Geowin_E
string.body: Geowin;An Informant stationed at Antriksha's Ascension Site. You can meet him if you enter Antriksha's Ascension Site when you have the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_gab_all_title01] title.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_Thales_E
string.body: Thales;A member of the Reconnaissance Troop in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re]. He observes the Beritra Army and Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_Seide_E
string.body: Sayde;A member of the Reconnaissance Troop in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re]. She observes the Beritra Army and the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF1A_Lehpar_Order
string.body: Suspicious[pl:"Suspicious"] Document[pl:"Documents"];Can be found in a house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_5_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Leander
string.body: Leander;Staff Officer of the Akaron Expedition Troop who supports Tribunus Elger.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Torka_E
string.body: Toska;An Officer from the Akaron Expedition Troop who observes the gateway to Gelkmaros. He is motivated and enjoys fighting.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Toleriand_E
string.body: Toriand;An Officer from the Akaron Patrol who supports Tribunus Helgund.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Askaria_E
string.body: Askaria;An officer in the Asmodian Akaron Patrol who is observing the gateway to Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Zoser_E
string.body: Joser;He previously served Captain Hinden, who went missing. Even after the captain's death, he still follows his order to guard Anair Lighthouse.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400
string.body: Sighting location;According to military reports, the place where the Beritra Army's weapon was sighted.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13401
string.body: Memory location;The place where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Watering_E] is said to have seen the Beritra Army's weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_1
string.body: Damaged Invasion Generator;A generator built by the Beritra Army. It appears to have been damaged, so it was abandoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_2
string.body: Inactive Invasion Generator;A generator built by the Beritra Army. It appears to be out of order and has been abandoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_1
string.body: Destroyed Invasion Generator;A generator built by the Beritra Army. It appears to have been destroyed and abandoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_2
string.body: Defective Invasion Generator;A generator built by the Beritra Army. It appears to be faulty and has been abandoned.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_e1_L_exchange_medal_01
string.body: Eriantos;An Elyos Ceranium merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V04]. He will only appear if the Elyos have occupied the base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_j1_L_exchange_medal_02
string.body: Ithea;An Elyos Ceranium merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V08]. He will only appear if the Elyos have occupied the base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_e1_D_exchange_medal_02
string.body: Aberon;An Asmodian Ceranium merchant in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V04]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have occupied the base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_j1_D_exchange_medal_01
string.body: Helgen;An Asmodian Ceranium merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V08]. He will only appear if the Asmodians have occupied the base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_3011_D_Teleport_NPC_V47
string.body: Neypumuk;A teleporter who teleports you from Akaron to the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] in Gelkmaros. He only appears if the Asmodians have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_2011_L_Teleport_NPC_V47
string.body: Pasiclas;A teleporter who teleports you from Akaron to the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] in Inggison. He only appears if the Elyos have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Quest_E
string.body: Hateron;An Officer in Pangaea Fortress who is in charge of the plans for capturing the four territories of Belus, Aspida, Athanos and Deylon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_D_MainQuest_E
string.body: Hallia;An Asmodian Administrator in the Temple of Honour in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby]. She is in charge of all operations in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_D_PangeaQuest_E
string.body: Eldran;An Asmodian Administrator in the Temple of Honour in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby]. His tasks relate to Pangaea and the Beritra invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_L_MainQuest_E
string.body: Adras;Administrator for the Hall of Fame in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby]. He is responsible for missions in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corridor_L_PangeaQuest_E
string.body: Pernas;Administrator for the Hall of Fame in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby]. He is responsible for missions concerning Pangaea and Beritra's Invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Damiring_E
string.body: Damirinerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam. She was dispatched to spy on the Steel Rose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1FD_E
string.body: Yurunerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam. He knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_1F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2FD_E
string.body: Chairinerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam. She knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_2F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3FD_E
string.body: Jarimonerk;A secret agent of Goldrinyerk Limited in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam. He knows the way to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_3F].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Sokorung_E
string.body: Sokorunerk;He works for Kuporinerk Comany and was dispatched to be responsible for deliveries to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Posorung_E
string.body: Posorunerk;He works for Kuporinerk Comany and was dispatched to be responsible for deliveries to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_ZoneTeleporter_L
string.body: Kleopis;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L]. He teleports you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_ZoneTeleporter_D
string.body: Kiundis;A teleporter in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D]. He teleports you to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Portal_Q10101a
string.body: Barrier Zone Invasion Corridor;An Abyss Gate opened by the Beritra Army using a generator at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_A_01] in Akaron. It appears to lead to another location.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Portal_Q20101a
string.body: Water Source Invasion Corridor;An Abyss Gate opened by the Beritra Army using a generator at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01] in Akaron. It seems to lead to another location.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF4Re_01_Q_FOBJ_Portal_Q10101a
string.body: Secret Zone Invasion Corridor;An Abyss Gate opened by the Beritra Army using a generator in the Baruna Research Laboratory. It appears to lead to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF4_Re_01_Ditono_E
string.body: Ditono the Spy;A Soldier from the Kahrun Escort who is hiding in the Baruna Research Laboratory disguised as a Drakan. He carries out missions when ordered to do so by Kahrun in order to uncover the Beritra Army's plans.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Florrick_E
string.body: Florik;A researcher of ancient civilisations in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Akaron. He is investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Gatener_E
string.body: Gattner;A researcher of ancient civilisations in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Akaron. He is investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03].

string.body: Therenoa;This Administrator appears when the Elyos have captured the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011].

string.body: Gantis;This Administrator appears when the Elyos have captured the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Banuan_D_E
string.body: Banuan;This Administrator appears when the Asmodians have captured the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Benia_L_L_E
string.body: Venir;This Fortress Chief of Staff appears when the Elyos have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. He seems to be responsible for special missions related to the Brigade Generals of the Invasion Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_7011_Salonte_D_L_E
string.body: Salonte;This Fortress Chief of Staff appears when the Asmodians have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011]. He seems to be responsible for special missions related to the Brigade Generals of the Invasion Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Reton_E
string.body: Reton;A fighter sent to provide backup. He appears in the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start], if the Elyos were unable to capture the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011], and he supports the soldiers in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Yivatu_E
string.body: Yivatu;A fighter sent to provide backup. He appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start], if the Asmodians were unable to capture the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011], and he supports the soldiers in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Named_Spawn_FOBJ
string.body: Anoha's Sword;A giant relic of the Rune Tribe in the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D1]. It gives off a spooky energy, buts its blade is blunt and lacklustre.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Anoha_Dead_E
string.body: Commander Anoha;Before he was defeated, this spirit was known as [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Boss_Anoha_65_Al]. He is now peace-loving and has regained his memory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Anaxa_E
string.body: Anax;A soldier in the Cleanup Squad who is monitoring activity in Draupnir Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1A_Brodir_E
string.body: Brodir;An Archon Sentinel stationed at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1A_Anmuring_E
string.body: Amurunerk;A Black Cloud Merchant who is keeping an eye on the MuMu at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Alberihi_E
string.body: Albrich;A member of the Shield Troop guarding the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF2_Flamyar_E
string.body: Piyama;Agnita's servant at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF2_DFlame].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Sopeia_E
string.body: Sopheia;Adjutant of the Protectorate who will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01] if you are victorious in the Agent Battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Syrot_E
string.body: Syrot;Adjutant of the Protectorate who will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01] if you are victorious in the Agent Battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1a_Schwanz_E
string.body: Hivan;An Archon Sentinel who is investigating the Haramel Secret Passage in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25]. It seems he isn't happy that he was dispatched there without his comrades.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Kurochin_E
string.body: Koruchinerk;A representative of the Black Cloud Merchants in the Heiron Fortress. The heavy burden of responsibility has made him tetchy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Brot_E
string.body: Sott;A Shadow Executor guarding the entrance to the Shadow Court. It seems that he travelled to Beluslan Fortress to meet someone there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Soraringring_E
string.body: Sorarinerk;A Shugo Merchant from the Tigraki Workshop who was dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] in Heiron. He is very ambitious and wants to make a name for himself by finding out new information.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF3_Chocorung_E
string.body: Choconerk;A Shugo Merchant from the Tigraki Workshop who has been dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G2_3]in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2a_Oflisma_E
string.body: Oplisma;A weapons expert dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_B4_2] in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_AB
string.body: Abyss Gate;An Abyss Gate which can be used to travel from Akaron to the Abyss. It is located in the west of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01] and south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q13706
string.body: Lost Pouch;This pouch contains the report written by the Vanguard that invaded Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_Q23706
string.body: Lost Bag;A bag containing the Operation Order for the infiltration of Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_LF4
string.body: Inggison Exit;An exit which can be used to get from Akaron to Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_DF4
string.body: Gelkmaros Exit;An exit which can be used to get from Akaron to Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Renitis_E
string.body: Lentis;An Informant in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L] in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Ekthe_E
string.body: Ekthe;An informant at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Fitreung_E
string.body: Pitrunerk;A Guild Member who is active in Kaldor. He built the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_Rune_L_Entrance_In] at the request of the Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF5_RP_L_Entrance_In
string.body: Katalamize Corridor;A corridor located to the south of the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_V01]in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_Rune_L_Entrance_In
string.body: Runadium Corridor;A corridor under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3] in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_GACHA
string.body: Scroomcnerk;A Shugo who exchanges [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_80615a] in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_randrian
string.body: Landria;A gainfully employed mother who always works hard for her family.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_event_madareke
string.body: Madareka;A gainfully employed mother who always works hard for her family.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LDF5b_Hoanon_E
string.body: Honan;An informant for the Gold Feather Legion. He knows the way from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C2_1] to Jormungand's Bridge, the Refuge of the Rune Tribe and the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LDF5b_Gronte_E
string.body: Gronte;An informant for the Red Fang Guerilla Squad. He knows the way from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1_1] to Jormungand's Bridge, the Refuge of the Rune Tribe and the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_Rhea_E
string.body: Jenny;Welcome Officer for the Refuge of Returnees. She welcomes and supports all Daevas who return to Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_Melrania_E
string.body: Janette;Welcome Officer for the Refuge of Returnees. She welcomes and supports all Daevas who return to Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_01_Entrance_In
string.body: Atreia Defence Corridor;It leads to the Draupnir Cave, the Theobomos Lab, the Adma Stronghold and to Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_L_clobby_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Inggison Corridor;It leads to Taloc, the Udas Temple, the abandoned Udas Temple and to Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_clobby_03_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Attack Corridor;A corridor that leads to the Aturam Sky Fortress, Rentus Base, Tiamat's Fortress and Tiamat's Hideout.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_clobby_04_Entrance_In
string.body: Balaurea Conquest Corridor;A corridor that leads to the Refuge of the Rune Tribe, Jormungand's Bridge, the Baruna Research Laboratory, the Rune Shield Tower and the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_01_Entrance_In
string.body: Atreia Defence Corridor;It leads to the Draupnir Cave, the Theobomos Lab, the Adma Stronghold and to Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Arena_D_clobby_02_Entrance_In
string.body: Gelkmaros Corridor;It leads to Taloc, the Udas Temple, the abandoned Udas Temple and to Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_LF2a_25
string.body: Banarinerk;A Shugo seen on the Latheron Coast. He is a member of the Meniherk Excavation Union and is very interested in the ruins in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_L_clobby_Entrance_In
string.body: Teleport Statue for the Refuge of Returnees;A teleport statue from Sanctum to the Refuge of Returnees. Or you can return using a returning stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_D_clobby_Entrance_In
string.body: Teleport Statue for the Refuge of Returnees;A teleport statue from Pandaemonium to the Refuge of Returnees. Or you can return using a returning stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nimrod_E
string.body: Nimrod;A strategist responsible for the invasion of the Aturam Sky Fortress. He's currently guarding the gate to the Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Haldor_E
string.body: Haldor;Commander in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Nineveh_E
string.body: Ninveh;A Daeva responsible for the invasion of the Aturam Sky Fortress. He's guarding the Dimension Gate that leads to the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10031A
string.body: Obelisk Platform;A supporting structure for obelisks in the Obelisk Valley. At present, it is empty.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10035A
string.body: Corridor Access Control;A device installed by the Balaur at the Inggison Entrance to the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_QuestArea_Q10035
string.body: Inggison Entrance to the Silentera Canyon;An entrance to the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_SensoryArea_Q10035A
string.body: Region of the Angrief Gate;The location of the Elyos gate that leads from Inggison Outpost to the Angrief Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_GAb1_Sub_Fuen_E
string.body: Fuen;An informant who was deployed to Antriksha's Ascension Site. You can meet him as soon as you defeat Antriksha.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC03
string.body: Parzinerk;Shugo Administrator for Trillonerk's Gold Vault and Indiana Jonshunerk's friend.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC01
string.body: Indiana Jonshunerk's Secret Passage;A secret passage into the Trillonerk's Gold Vault.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC02
string.body: Indiana Jonshunerk;A Suspicious Shugo who asks you for help.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC04
string.body: Gawainerk;Shugo Administrator for Trillonerk's Gold Vault. He fled from the intruders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_CogelHogan_E
string.body: Logan;An Information Officer who provides newcomers with help and information.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Bonat_E
string.body: Bonath;Centurion that carries out missions for Governor Haldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Nixie_E
string.body: Nixie;Researcher of Ancient Civilisations. She has a soft voice and stops speaking when she's lost in thought. She's a very devoted researcher and spares no effort.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501a
string.body: Broken Relic[pl:"Relics"];A relic near the village where Nixie found the fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501b
string.body: Destroyed Balaur Relic[pl:"Relics"];A relic with a design similar to the one on the fragment found by Nixie. It's so heavily damaged that it can no longer yield any information.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_Q20501c
string.body: Balaur Relic[pl:"Relics"];A relic that can be used to inspect fragments like the one found by Nixie. It's only slightly damaged so it can still offer up usable information.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatArmy_Corpse_Q20501a
string.body: Balaur Corpse;A Drakan Corpse that smells severely decomposed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Walqule_E
string.body: Valkyr;Expedition Troop Commander. She wants to support the many scholars in her troop.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kronag_E
string.body: Kronac;A Reian cultural researcher. He feels a debt of gratitude to the Asmodians, who have helped his people. He trusts the Asmodian biologist [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kanovi_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kanovi_E
string.body: Canob;An Asmodian biologist. He blocks out everything around him when he concentrates on his work. He also enjoys the trust of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kronag_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Muratun_E
string.body: Muratu;Sapien Elder. He came to the Asmodians to request their help. They refused to talk to him, so now he's waiting in a hideout and is being attacked by enemy Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Batuga_E
string.body: Batuga;An envoy of the Sapiens. He came to the Asmodians to request their help, but the attempt failed. That's why he's now waiting near the Asmodian Guard Post.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Engrid_E
string.body: Engrid;Researcher of Ancient Civilisations with exceptional skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Egzen_E
string.body: Egzen;Commander who is thoroughly determined to become an outstanding Archon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Xeikun_E
string.body: Jekun;Commander of the Expedition Troop. He has many questions about the things happening in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Jalturan_E
string.body: Jalturan;Sapien Elder. He helped the Asmodians and now hopes for their support in return. They did not welcome him, however, and he can now be found near the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Cnut_E
string.body: Knut;A commander who is very distrustful. However, once you manage to gain his trust, he's exceptionally loyal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Maleite_E
string.body: Malleit;Scout observing the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatSealGuard_Q20505a
string.body: Bodyguard Corpse;A member of the squad who was attacked by the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_TiamatSeal_Q20505a
string.body: Field Warden Corpse;A member of the troop who was attacked by the Beritra Army. It's clear the victim was carrying something on him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Sefrimnir_E
string.body: Sefrimir;Centurion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Julia_E
string.body: Julya;Leader of the Search Party. Her appearance and way of talking don't show it, but she's a veteran of the Archons and has been given the mission to penetrate the desert of Eracus in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Vard_E
string.body: Bard;Governor of the Protectorate. He lost Daevas beyond counting on the day of the Major Offensive, but in recognition of his success in Katalam, Marchutan reappointed him as Governor.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Theodoricus_E
string.body: Theodricus;A humble seer who can read currents of power and thus predict the future.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Daruku_E
string.body: Daruku;He was sent by the Sapiens to help the Asmodians and he finds Shugos extremely annoying.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Bakun_E
string.body: Bakun;A member of the Search Party who was trained to track the energy of the Ancient Crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Gilgamesh_E
string.body: Girmesh;Together with his troops he wanted to prevent Tiamat from ascending to become a Dragon Lord. But he lost the battle, was cursed and thus became an undead Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Jadun_E
string.body: Jadun;He set off to complete a search party mission. Contact with him was lost and he's been considered missing ever since.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nubes_E
string.body: Nuves;A member of the New Start Legion who was dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Atmos_E
string.body: Atmos;Governor of the New Start Legion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01]. He is responsible for researching [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Mosphera_E
string.body: Mosphera;A member of the New Start Legion who is researching the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Broken_Wedgestone_Q10501a
string.body: Destroyed Relic[pl:"Relics"];A relic that is marked on Mosphera's map. It can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Tiamat_SealWatcher_Q10501a
string.body: Ancient Balaur Corpse[pl:"Corpses"];The Balaur corpse that are marked on Mosphera's map. It can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nixkaion_E
string.body: Kaion;An archaeologist researching the history of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nixkaion_Disguise_E
string.body: Hidden Kaion;An archaeologist dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. He's studying the methods and the history of the Black Fins Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Soil_Creep_Q10502a
string.body: Glittering Earth Mound[pl:"Mounds"];Piles of earth that can be found in the region of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01]. They provide clues about the movement of the earth's crust.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Ancient_Fossil_Q10502a
string.body: Ancient Fossil[pl:"Fossils"];A fossil of an ancient creature that can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Eukraton_E
string.body: Eukraton;Commander of the 2nd Unit of the New Start Legion who is responsible for security in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Euvia_E
string.body: Yubia;An expert in mystical flowers, presently examining the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Old_Papyrus_Q10503a
string.body: Balaur Document[pl:"Documents"];A document written in the ancient Balaur language. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_SensoryArea_Q10503
string.body: Aetheric Field Earthstone[pl:"Earthstones"];Tiamat's Runeseal Stone, guarded by the Aetheric Field Protectorate. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Astrape_E
string.body: Astrop;Member of the New Start Legion, who is responsible for pursuing the Beritra soldiers in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. She can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Broken_Slate_Q10504a
string.body: Broken Pledge Tablet[pl:"Tablets"];A tablet that is very old and brittle. It's impossible to tell what it says on it. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Averse_E
string.body: Aver;Member of the New Start Legion in Attica, who is responsible for procuring information in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Erinos_E
string.body: Erinos;A covert agent gathering intelligence at the Provisional Guard post of the Beritra Army. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Ripped_Plan_Q10505a
string.body: Torn Page[pl:"Pages"];A page of the document that Erinos has strewn all over the place with his sneezing. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Brontte_E
string.body: Branth;Commander of the 3rd Unit of the New Start Legion who is responsible for pursuing the Beritra Army in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. She can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Pnoeh_E
string.body: Phanoe;She monitors the Beritra Army and is following Beritra's trail. She can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Fake_Vritra_Portal_Q10506a
string.body: Beritra's Invasion Corridor;Invasion corridor opened by the Beritra Army. They say that you can use it to reach the location where Tiamat hid her treasure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Aithria_E
string.body: Altria;Commander of the New Start Legion. She can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Pluvius_E
string.body: Fluvio;Centurion of the 1st Unit of the New Start Legion. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Pruina_E
string.body: Puino;Centurion of the 2nd Unit of the New Start Legion. She can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Rocio_E
string.body: Rocio;Centurion of the 3rd Unit of the New Start Legion. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nostibas_E
string.body: Nostivas;A member of the Downfall Legion who can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Vritra_Box_Q10507a
string.body: Supply Box[pl:"Boxes"];A crate with the supplies of the 48th Army. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_SensoryArea_Q10507
string.body: Leader's Quarters;The quarters of the leader of the Beritra Defence Squad. It can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1132_Merchant_Li
string.body: Cachus;Quartermaster in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_20] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1131_Merchant_Li
string.body: Kercopes;Quartermaster in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_23] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1141_Merchant_Li
string.body: Proserpine;Quartermaster in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_13] in Reshanta.

Bring him the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_tiamatdown_r_01], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_tiamatdown_l_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_tiamatdown_u_01] and he'll give you a reward bundle in exchange.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_koschei
string.body: King Kohei;He wants to enlist the help of a band of thieves from the Otherworld in order to regain his power and thus to conquer Atreia. He's immortal but the [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle] can be used to make him invulnerable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Matroskin
string.body: Mikesh;A cat that was accidentally brought from the Otherworld to Atreia by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_koschei]. It wants to go home.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_event_Rusbox
string.body: Wooden Box[pl:"Boxes"];A box that conceals the [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle]. It's hidden somewhere deep and is extremely difficult to find.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_event_koscheiego
string.body: King Clone;A clone of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_koschei], who wants to increase his power and conquer Atreia. He can be made invulnerable using [%dic:STR_DIC_key_world_event_Koschei_Niddle].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Dike_E
string.body: Dike;She is the fourth Agent of Kaisinel. She has been tasked with the defence of Signia in Lord Kaisinel's absence.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Efaion_E
string.body: Ephaion;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces who assists Agent Dike in defending Signia. He's a good person to speak to if it's about Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Agon_E
string.body: Agon;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces who assists Agent Dike in defending Signia. He's a good person to speak to if it's about Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Potencia_E
string.body: Patensia;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces. She helps Ephaion carry out missions in Signia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Machina_E
string.body: Machina;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces. She helps Agon carry out missions in Signia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Nephoria_E
string.body: Nephoria;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces who is on a mission in Signia. She was last seen near the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_CtoP1_Telepot_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Frestelle_E
string.body: Restelle;A Daeva from Kaisinel's forces who is on a mission in Signia. She was last seen in the Windstream between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF4_Somation_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Skuldun_E
string.body: Skuldun;The fourth representative of Marchutan. He is entrusted with defending Balaurea in his Lord's absence.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Fachmann_E
string.body: Ashman;A Daeva from Marchutan's Forces who assists Agent Skuldun in defending Vengar. He's a good person to speak to if it's about Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Kampfyna_E
string.body: Ampina;A Daeva from Marchutan's Forces who assists Agent Skuldun in defending Vengar. She's a good person to speak to if it's about Daevanion equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Higkeit_E
string.body: Hikai;A Daeva from Marchutan's Forces. He helps Ashman with this missions in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Maschine_E
string.body: Masine;A Daeva from Marchutan's Forces. She helps Ampina with her missions in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Nuiage_E
string.body: Naju;A Daeva from Marchutan's Forces who is on a mission in Vengar. She was last seen using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_C_FieldAttraction_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_Quirung_E
string.body: Quirunerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Merchants. Travels back and forth between the most important headquarters and villages in Signia. Only appears on the home server.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_Edierung_E
string.body: Edirunerk;A Shugo of the Black Cloud Merchants. He travels back and forth between the most important landing sites and villages in Vengar. Only appears on the home server.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF5_CtoP1_Telepot_L
string.body: Giant Shell;A shell that takes you from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_Shark] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_01] in Signia.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_C_FieldAttraction_D
string.body: Transport Barrel;A barrel which you can use to get from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_C_01] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P1_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF5_G_FieldAttraction_D
string.body: Wobbly Jellyfish;A jellyfish which you can ride to travel from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_G_01] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P2_01].

All four devices are connected to each other and must be activated to increase the unsealing level. If the energy of the unsealing device dissipates, it will have to be reactivated.

It was cloaked using Shugo technology but as soon as you use the Shugo Transformation Potion, you can find it using you newly won abilities.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Caegarla_E
string.body: Kaegara;An Ascension Assistant for the Crucible who was sent to Reshanta. He's responsible for Special Ascension Assistance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF6_Remaia_E
string.body: Rimaia;A researcher from the Heavenly Lights who is investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform]. She is located at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I_Qspot] in Esterra.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF6_Stula_E
string.body: Stella;A researcher from the Shadowbringers who is investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform]. She is located at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Qspot] in Nosra.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTransform_Exit_All
string.body: Orb[pl:"Orbs"] of Fate;A mysterious orb that is enchanted with powerful magic. It's located inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTransform_Entrance
string.body: Entrance to the Rift of Oblivion;It appeared in Atreia suddenly and leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform]. Elyos find it at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I_Qspot] in Esterra and Asmodians at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Qspot] in Nosra.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LC1_event_ldice_girl_E
string.body: Catherine;A girl who has likely visited Wonderland. She may have obtained a number of cards there. You can find her in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DC1_event_ldice_girl_E
string.body: Lydl;A girl who has likely visited the Land of Mirrors. She may have obtained a number of cards there. You can find her in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF6_op_toplevel_equip_seller_01
string.body: Asminon;He issues Protectors Mark equipment. You can find him in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP]. He will give you the Protectors equipment when you present your Mark.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF6_op_toplevel_equip_seller_01
string.body: Hamanradon;He issues Protectors Mark equipment. You can find him in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP]. He will give you the Protectors equipment when you present your Mark.

string.body: Elly;A being with artificial intelligence that was created by Lunanerk. Elly gives you information on the Luna Cube and on missions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Letia
string.body: Letia;A pet-loving Daeva. She's [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rhea]'s sister and looks after pets on [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LC1_Damasion_E
string.body: Damation;Drunkard Daeva. He can be found at the wayside on the road to the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_FOBJ_FrozenPot_Q10530
string.body: Frosted Ellianan;A Guestbloom being tended to by Leah. It represents Sanctum's wealth. It was damaged by an unidentified frost and is now being tended to on [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_FOBJ_DrakanAltar_Q10530
string.body: Greatmage's Small Incense Burner[pl:"Burners"];A special incense burner for spells, which still contains burnt residue. You can find it in the back alleys at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_FOBJ_MagicTriangle_Q10530
string.body: Magic Ward of Dark Energy;A magic ward painted in shimmering black and red. You can find it in a back alley at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_SensoryArea_Q10530A
string.body: Shipyard Back Alley;An inconspicuous place in the remotest corner of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Silke
string.body: Silke;A pet-loving Daeva. She looks after pets on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DC1_Zwhariman_E
string.body: Jiharimaan;Drunkard Daeva. He can be found at the wayside on the road to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_FOBJ_FrozenPot_Q20530
string.body: Frosted Pandeanan;A Guestbloom treasured by Heimdall, which represents Pandaemonium's wealth. It was damaged by an unidentified frost and is now being tended to on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_FOBJ_DrakanAltar_Q20530
string.body: Greatmage’s Tiny Incense Burner[pl:"Burners"];A special Incense Burner that contains ashes and is used for casting spells. It can be found in the side alleys of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_FOBJ_MagicTriangle_Q20530
string.body: Magic Ward of Diabolic Energy;A magic ward painted in ominous black and red. You can find it in a secluded corner of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_SensoryArea_Q20530A
string.body: Entrance to a Secluded Corner;An inconspicuous place in the remotest corner of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_FOBJ_Bottle_Q10530
string.body: Omblic Brandy Bottle[pl:"Bottles"];A bottle often encountered in Sanctum. You can find it at the wayside on the road to the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA_tempest].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_FOBJ_Bottle_Q20530
string.body: Cherry Brandy Bottle[pl:"Bottles"];A bottle often encountered in Pandaemonium. You can find it at the wayside on the road to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_AB1_29
string.body: Baorunerk;A Shugo Merchant from the Tigraki Workshop at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_3] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDTM_L_NPC_Shugo_Manager
string.body: Peronerk;A Shugo of the Red Sand Conglomerate who runs the Golden Crucible and the Gold Arena. You will find him in the Golden Crucible lounges.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF6_OP_ZoneTeleport_L
string.body: Manto;A teleporter you can find in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF6_OP_ZoneTeleport_D
string.body: Ortiga;A teleporter you can find in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_event_newyear_fufurin
string.body: Pupurinerk;He used to be a capable Aether researcher. But for the past ten years he's done nothing but research the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_newyear_year].

string.name: STR_DIC_event_npc_shugo_silvering_l
string.body: Gawainerk;A Shugo who keeps the peace in Atreia. He is looking for Daevas to help him.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_npc_shugo_silvering_d
string.body: Gawainerk;A Shugo who keeps the peace in Atreia. He is looking for Daevas to help him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_Guide_Teleport_L_01
string.body: Reta;Younger twin sister of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_Guide_Buff_01]. Helps special users with a special teleportation service.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_Guide_Buff_01
string.body: Roper;Older twin sister of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_Guide_Teleport_L_01]. Provides special users with special buffs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_event_fifth_tree
string.body: Talisman Tree[pl:"Trees"];A tree with a special energy that helps to drive out misfortune. If you seal the misfortune and hang it from the tree, you will receive a special reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF6_Shuket_E
string.body: Shuket;A Shulack from the Iron Star Pirates. He came to Nosra to find his companions. He was recently seen in the Cursed Gorge in Nosra.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF6_CowardCellatu_E
string.body: Cowardly Gerkan;A Cellatu who set off to defeat the Tigric leader. At night, he's nowhere to be found. He was last seen during the day near a Cellatu tribute jug.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Bastiel_E
string.body: Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol, which is on a research mission in Narakkalli. He can be found in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Start_Bastiel_E
string.body: Infiltrated Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol He's on an Infiltration Mission in Narakkalli near the Room of Penance.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Manager_Front_Bastiel_E
string.body: Calm Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol. Appears on the 1st floor of the Sakra Prison Camp when you free the captive Daevas in Narakkalli and destroy the generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Manager_Room_Bastiel_E
string.body: Cautious Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol. Appears near the Passage to the Tranquil Path once you've eliminated Director Mahorosh in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Root_Front_Bastiel_E
string.body: Injured Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol Is on an Infiltration Mission in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Root_Room_Bastiel_E
string.body: Recovered Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol Is on an Infiltration Mission in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Terrarium_Start_Bastiel_E
string.body: Exhausted Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol Is on an Infiltration Mission in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Terrarium_End_Bastiel_E
string.body: Sorrowful Bastiel;Leader of the Freedom Arrow Patrol He's on an Infiltration Mission in Narakkalli at the Altar of Tranquillity.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Dead_Deva_L_E
string.body: Immobilised Elyos Daeva[pl:"Daevas"];A Daeva wrapped in the roots of a giant plant and who can't move. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Dying_Deva_L_E
string.body: Dying Elyos Daeva[pl:"Daevas"];A Daeva wrapped in the roots of a giant plant and who is close to death. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_Pain_Deva_L_E
string.body: Suffering Elyos Daeva[pl:"Daevas"];A Daeva wrapped in the roots of a giant plant and who is in pain. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Familiar_officer_L_SP
string.body: Minion Administration Officer[pl:"Officer"];An officer responsible for banishing aggressive minions with contracts. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_Familiar_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF4_M_Familiar_E] are looking for Daevas who want to take care of minions.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Familiar_officer_D_SP

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF4_V07_L_Coin_Change
string.body: Amurunerk;Appears when the Elyos have occupied the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_LF4_M_07] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4]. He is known to collect rare coins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF4_V07_D_Coin_Change
string.body: Amorinerk;A Shugo who appears when the Asmodians have conquered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_M_07] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4]. He is known to collect rare coins.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_World_event_halloween_Bombstop
string.body: Charging Station for Bonbon Bombs;You can charge[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_World_event_halloween_Candybomb] here. Appears at certain intervals. As always: first come, first to charge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_world_event_halloween_milkyway_01
string.body: Esta;Chairman of the Milky Way League who organises the Halloween festival. You can find him in the capital.

string.body: Acting Royer;She is on a mission for Kasis.

string.body: Old Friend Royer;Pernos' grandchild and a childhood friend.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_C4_E
string.body: Scouting Royer;Investigating material in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] which has something to do with the Lepharists.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_D10_E
string.body: Nightmare-ridden Royer;She can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_DTW] and suffers from nightmares due to terrifying events.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_E1_E
string.body: Intelligence-gathering Royer;She is searching the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_004] for information about the insane Kishar Krall.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_E2_E
string.body: Fighting Royer;She is trying to keep the Balaur in check at the Cleanup Squad Outpost near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_E3_E
string.body: Waiting Royer;She is waiting for [%username] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_F2_E
string.body: Liberated Royer;She is talking to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_8] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_014].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF3_Loye_OP_E
string.body: Royer 2;You can find Royer in front of the Obelisk at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pernos_60
string.body: Pernos;After you lost your family on the Day of the Storm, he took [%username] in to raise along with Royer. He now lives in a small house in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA02], where he is compiling a history book.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_SoulFemale_Q1055
string.body: Released Soul[pl:"Souls"];The soul appears after placing the Undead Skull from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] upon the Stone Coffin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_NoMove_Daminu_60
string.body: Daminu;Chieftain of the Elim Tribe in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04] in Poeta. He is the ruler of the forest. Play the Daminu Flute to move.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Sleeping_01
string.body: Rooted Elder[pl:"Elders"];An Elim elder who has slept for many years deep within [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04]. He has part of the Daminu Flute.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Sleeping_02
string.body: Branching Elder[pl:"Elders"];An Elim elder who has slept for many years deep within [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04]. He has part of the Daminu Flute.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tree_Sleeping_03
string.body: Leafy Elder[pl:"Elders"];An Elim elder who has slept for many years deep within [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04]. He split the Daminu Flute in twain long ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDCromede_Rotan_body
string.body: Grave Robber's Corpse;Apparently, this grave robber thought he could steal the treasure from the Temple Vault.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDUnderpass_Solo_Loye_E
string.body: Royer;Suffering from the lack of Aether in Balaurea, she has so far been unable to help [%username] with the mission.

string.body: Idarus;A wilting Elim in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. He is now an Agrint, but he still remembers when he was an Elim.

string.body: Kubrinerk;A Shugo who uses refined Aether to research the Cube, which enhances its user's power. He is presently at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G] in Lakrum, having been forced to flee the Shulacks who captured his laboratory.

string.body: Cheerful Kubrinerk;A Shugo who uses refined Aether to research the Cube, which enhances its user's power. He appears after you have killed Malarkin's followers and captured the Cube Laboratory.

string.body: Darlingrunerk;A pretty Shugo lady, who is in a relationship with Cutierunerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_WORLD_EDUEVENT_LOSTLOVEROONG
string.body: Lost Darlingrunerk;Cutierunerk's girlfriend, who followed a pretty butterfly and became lost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Hans_E
string.body: Crazy Hans;A member of the Life Debt Legion vanguard. He fled from something and simply cannot find rest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Putio_E
string.body: Crazy Putio;A member of the Wise Judgement Legion vanguard. He fled from something and simply cannot find rest.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810b
string.body: Storage Location of Aion's Relic;A sacred relic imbued with Aion's Power of Creation. It is allegedly kept in the depths of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62811a
string.body: Ereshkigal, who wants to seize control of the relic;Ereshkigal cast a spell on Aion's Relic and is sacrificing Daevas in an attempt to transform the power of creation that resides within the relic into a force of destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Pandora_Main_L_E
string.body: Berio;He manages the Pandora Recruitment Office. He knows more than all the other employees.

string.body: Frodia;A Daeva who works in the Pandora Recruitment Office. They say she lived Eltnen Fortress, which vanished on the Day of the Storm.

string.body: Dias;A Daeva who works in the Pandora Recruitment Office. He's pretty small.

string.body: Lana;A Daeva who works in the Pandora Recruitment Office. She and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Pandora_Torso_L_E] are siblings.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Pandora_Torso_L_E

string.body: Cursed Obelisk;The Cursed Obelisk that was erected by Bollvig. He's preventing the Elyos soldiers from returning to the flow of Aether.

string.body: Bollvig's Dominion;Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F3], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F5]. Use the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39915a] to break the curse that was placed on the area.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_ItemUseArea_Q39932
string.body: Hanarkand;[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39932a] are intended to be erected here. The Balaur can be driven off with the power of the Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_ItemUseArea_Q39946
string.body: Rokoros;You can set up [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_39946a] here to weaken the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF3_ItemUseArea_Q49915
string.body: Alukina's Dominion;Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E5], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E2]. With a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_49915a] you can also see the hidden Golden Trumpet Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_ItemUseArea_Q49932
string.body: Strigik Forest and Village;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_49932a] are intended to be erected here. The Balaur can be driven off with the power of the Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_ItemUseArea_Q49946
string.body: Twilight Drana Farm;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_49946a] are meant to be distributed here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Argon_E
string.body: Argon;Officer for Guardian services. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1], but isn't there from midnight to 12 noon on Mondays.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Meridune_E
string.body: Meridun;Officer for Archon services. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1], but isn't there from midnight to 12 noon on Mondays.

string.body: Isnir;He has been wandering as a ghost since he was felled by Girad in the fight for the Hererim Mine.

string.body: Tightly Locked Cabinet[pl:"Cabinets"];A cabinet left behind by Bukarota. It's locked tight and seems to contain something important.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF4_Fungy_Cactus_Namaed_E
string.body: Enlightened Tuporu;A giant Mookie who was raised by the Shulacks in Rokoros. He works for the rights of the Mookies by opposing the Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDBattle_Change_Illusia_E
string.body: Illusia;Yustiel's messenger, who was dispatched to Illumiel to investigate the flow of Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDBattle_Change_Delluzia_E
string.body: Delusia;Lumiel's messenger, who was dispatched to Illumiel to help the Asmodian Daevas with training.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_02
string.body: Cursed Senekta Statue;Ereshkigal turned[%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03_Before], western guardian of Senekta, into this stone statue. Use the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_idf7_ere_stone_01] to summon [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_01
string.body: Jarba;The eastern guardian of the subterranean refuge [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere] in Lakrum. He lost the eastern Oracular Chamber to the Balaur and has been locked in the Cold Prison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03_Before
string.body: Arbo;The western guardian of the subterranean refuge [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere] in Lakrum. Ereshkigal turned him to stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_03
string.body: Arbo's Ghost;Use the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_idf7_ere_stone_01] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF7_Ere_Prison_Nepilim_02], to summon him.

string.body: Master Kubrinerk;A Shugo who can use refined Aether to create a Cube which enhances its user's power. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Shugo_Cuberin_D_E

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Obes_E
string.body: Obes;A Life Debt Centurion. He helps Daevas get to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lorona_E
string.body: Lorona;An Information Officer working in the PR Department at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] who looks after workers who are being dispatched for the first time. She helps Elyos Daevas get to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_B1_Manutt_E
string.body: Manut;Captain of the army responsible for destroying [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega]. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B1].

string.body: Shady Passage;A cave entrance that is being guarded by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_B_D3_Lega_L_All]. It seems to lead somewhere important. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission01_Inanna_E
string.body: Underground Fighter;A mysterious girl who is about to fight the Rega Drakan at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Donas_E
string.body: Donas;A lazy, irresolute Guardian Patrol Commander who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] by the Elyos Army. He can only be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] from 9 AM to 6 PM. Nobody knows where else he hangs around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellaky_E
string.body: Stellaki;An employee who works in the main building at the Stella Corporation. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_G1_Manutt_E
string.body: Crazed Manut;The former captain of the Rega Clean-up Army who can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G2]. Rumour has it that he fled after the Rega Purge. He seems to have changed.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission02_FOBJ_Entrance_L
string.body: Door[pl:"Doors"] with Drakan Handprint;Was discovered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G1]. In the middle of the door, there is a bloody Drakan handprint. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] was seen close by.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Inanna02_E
string.body: Unconscious Inanna;When [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Tiamat_Crown] exploded, Inanna lost consciousness from the force of the blast. She doesn't look right. Is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission02_FOBJ_Inanna_Inside_In
string.body: Rift of Separate Consciousness;Caused when Inanna's consciousness was detached from her body. This rift appears to be connected to Inanna's consciousness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Shulack_Tellakiki_E
string.body: Terakiki;An executive director at the Stella Corporation. He was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02] to retrieve Tiamat's Crown, a relic of the Dragon Lord, and keep an eye on Inanna.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission02_Inanna01_E
string.body: Vishaka's Pursuer;The [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission01_Inanna_E] you met at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01]. She is chasing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02] to help the Stella sympathizers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Inanna_E
string.body: Skipjack Inanna;Inanna, whom you met after she had fainted at Vishaka's Hideout. She seems friendly because you rescued her from the tragic memory in which she lived as a Balaur mutation. She is visiting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Moogle_Bumbum_Soon_E
string.body: Bumbumsun;A shy, fearful Skurv. Her home was destroyed on the Day of the Storm so the Stella Corporation took her under its wing. Now she lives at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_FOBJ_OfficerPaper_Q60603a
string.body: Secretary's Document[pl:"Documents"];A document written by a secretary at the Stella Corporation. It contains information on the members who have visited the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest]. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_F_Inanna_L_E
string.body: Rascal Inanna;She followed Muratan's trail to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission]. Muratan's friend Bumbumsun is missing. Inanna is in shock because something dreadful happened at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_F_Report_Q60603a
string.body: Unit Adversaria 1;A research journal on the experiment conducted in the first Temporary NK Unit. It deals with minimising the side effects of Nakisix. It contains information on the research objective, test subjects and results. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_F_Report_Q60603b
string.body: Unit Adversaria 2;A research journal on the experiment conducted in the second Temporary NK Unit. It deals with research into the follow-on product to Nakisix. It contains information on the research objective, test subjects and results. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lycan_Muratan_L_E
string.body: Wet Blanket Muratan;A friend of the missing Skurv Bumbumsun. He was a test subject at the Stella Corporation and was forcibly sent from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest] to the Temporary NK Unit. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_F_Khyle_E
string.body: Kyle the Maverick;He is Manut's brother and a member of the Guardian Patrol. When Manut went missing, he started investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] on his own initiative. In doing so he discovered the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Khyle_E
string.body: Helper Kyle;Used to be a member of the Guardian Patrol. Since his brother Manut went missing, he has suspected the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6]. He won't stop until he uncovers the truth. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellkin_E
string.body: Stelkin;A Stella Corporation employee who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission]. She is responsible for the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Snuwa], the natives of Dumaha who stole the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_E_Report_Q60604a
string.body: Lost Report[pl:"Reports"];A report written by Stelkin, who holds a senior position at the Stella Corporation. The report was probably meant for the main building at the Stella Corporation. Stelkin lost this section of the report in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Entrance_L
string.body: Channel of Mystery;A channel secretly used by the Stella Corporation. They're probably using it to transport the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy]. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Zablon_E
string.body: Zablon;A Wise Judgement Centurion. He helps Daevas get to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Psyche_E
string.body: Psyche;An Information Officer working in the PR Department at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] who looks after workers who are being dispatched for the first time. She helps Asmodian Daevas get to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_B2_Anuk_E
string.body: Anuk;Captain of the army responsible for destroying [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega]. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_Stella_Box_Q70601a
string.body: Stella Supply Box[pl:"Boxes"];Contains [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_70601a]. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_DOP].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission01_FOBJ_Entrance_D
string.body: Twilight Passage;A cave entrance that is being guarded by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_B_D3_Lega_D_All]. It seems to lead somewhere important. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Monan_E
string.body: Monan;A selfish, malicious Archon Patrol Commander who was dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] by the Asmodian Army. He can only be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] from 9 AM to 6 PM. Nobody knows where else he hangs around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_E_Manutt_E
string.body: NK-VI Addict Manut;He secretly infiltrated [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission] to procure Nakisix. He is exhibiting severe withdrawal symptoms and doesn't seem able to talk to you.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission03_Inanna_E
string.body: Rescued Inanna;Sakagin, Chief Overseer of the Development Laboratory, wanted her dead, but you rescued her. She came to ask a friend at Stella about Nakisix after Muratan's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Medena_E
string.body: Medena;Governor of the Altar Siege. She is helping the Stella Corporation to investigate Apsu's Relics. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Leibo_Quest_Get_Reward
string.body: Tezabobo;A mysterious Leibo believed to be connected to the Aion Tower. You can summon him using the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60610a].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elsi_Quest_Get_Reward
string.body: Leanor;A minion master. She explains to Daevas in Atreia how to summon minions, level them up, upgrade them and combine them. You can summon her using [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60615a].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pixel_Quest_Get_Reward

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_Stella_Box01
string.body: Chest[pl:"Chests"] of the Balaur Ancestry;A chest which stores the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] which the Stella Corporation acquired in Dumaha. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Entrance_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_FOBJ_Stella_Box02
string.body: Chest[pl:"Chests"] of the Balaur Legacy;A chest which stores the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] which the Stella Corporation acquired in Dumaha. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Entrance_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box01
string.body: NK-VI Substance Supply[pl:"Supplies"];Contains the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy]. This is the contents of the ‘Chests of the Balaur Legacy' which were found at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03]. Going by the name, it seems to be materials for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] here. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step4].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box02
string.body: NK-VI Extraction Pipe[pl:"Pipes"];A pipe through which the power of the Dragon Lord is extracted from the Dragon Lord Legacy. The highly refined power and the remnants are separated and conveyed through a pipeline. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step7].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_FOBJ_Stella_Box03
string.body: Balaur cylinder[pl:"cylinders"];Contains a Balaur test subject. Nobody knowns what it is used for. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step9].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DMAHA_SOULING
string.body: Soulinerk;The best adventurer in all Atreia. Talks a lot, good at pep talks. A nice enough chap, really.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DMAHA_PAMERINGRING
string.body: Poumerlinerk;Totally addicted to all that shines. Demands lots of Dumallonds.
